campaigns.title: Running for Wuhan, China
campaigns.description:
Purpose:   I will be raising money to fight the coronavirus outbreak in Wuhan, China, by running 1km for every $50 donated while wearing a mask.¬†
 

 The money will be donated to Give2Asia, who has partnered with leading Chinese public health organizations to support frontline health workers and hospitals responding to the coronavirus crisis.
 

 _________________________________________________
 

  Death has been everywhere lately.   In the news, friends of friends, the NBA community, and everyone's social media posts. I cannot escape it, death, they say it‚Äôs inevitable, but I've never had trouble forgetting.   ¬†Funerals and deathly illnesses seem so beyond my twenty-two-year-old life, and surely, the intellects would find a cure, and everything will be fine. But these days, death leaves no escape reminding everyone that life is short and death, inevitable.  ¬†In recent news, death has stacked up like coins slotting in connect four. Articles and videos scream for attention as hourly updates on the coronavirus create fear and confusion. Political agendas have started, and fear uncovers ignorance as racist comments blaze, blaming and burning the Chinese.¬†   I sit in my home in Canada, as I witness doctors fainting and family members shouting in desperation for their loved ones in lack of beds and medical supplies on the other side of the globe. At the same time, patients are in isolation, not knowing whether the new virus will claim their lives.   I wait for it to pass, dodging coughs and sneezes while mumbling a simple prayer hoping my pack of face masks and beliefs will be enough to keep me from falling ill. I'm thankful it's not me who is quarantined.   Yet with each new death toll, and hourly update, my sitting here is not enough. I click another video and the desperation of those isolated and afraid force tears in my eyes.  ¬†A few fundraisers that have already popped up, but I started this one for my community. If I'm honest, I'm still hesitant in creating this, as doubt forms silly questions, ‚ÄúWill I meet or even come close to my goal?‚Äù I have decided not to let it stop me.    I will be raising money to fight the coronavirus outbreak in Wuhan, China, by running 1km for every $50 donated while wearing a mask.    If I meet my goal of $5k, the money will be donated to  Give2Asia,  who has partnered with leading Chinese public health organizations to support frontline health workers and hospitals responding to the coronavirus crisis.  For more information:    https://give2asia.org/donate-help-fight-coronavirus-outbreak-wuhan-china/  ¬†   ¬†Your donations will be used for:  ¬∑¬†¬†¬†¬†¬† Procuring masks, protection suits, goggles, and other necessary medical equipment for the treatment and containment ¬∑¬†¬†¬†¬†¬† Providing meals and lodging to the thousands of health workers traveling to areas most affected by the outbreak ¬∑¬†¬†¬†¬†¬† Long-term training and support for medical workers working on the front lines of this and future epidemics

campaigns.title: CHINA CORONAVIRUS SHORTAGE OF MEDICAL EQUIPMENT
campaigns.description:
Hi everyone. I'm raising money to donate to Give2Asia, who will be able to fund for medical supplies, food, and proper long-term medical training for those currently living in the quarantined province of Hubei in China. Any donation will help make an impact. As we are all aware, the coronavirus has been responsible for the deaths of 81 people worldwide, and over 2,800 people infected worldwide. These numbers are bound to keep rising as the coronavirus is an extremely contagious airborne disease with no current known cure. Major hospitals in China in the Hubei province, the site of the first recorded cases of the virus, have reported a dangerous shortage of medical supplies such as goggles, Level A Hazmat suits, masks, and gloves. With the entire province of Hubei in lockdown, citizens would also inevitably suffer from a shortage of food, water, and other necessary daily supplies. This virus is spreading quickly worldwide, and we need to do everything in our power to help in the efforts of stopping the rapid spread of this disease before its extensive damage and resulting casualties reaches the rest of the world. All donations would immediately go to the nonprofit organization Give2Asia. Thank you in advance for your contribution to this cause. Every single penny makes a difference.  More information about Give2asia (G2a): Our mission is to strengthen communities throughout Asia by building trusted networks for charitable investment. We envision healthy and prosperous communities supported by an expanded flow of philanthropy and locally-led development. Our work focuses on key issues such as healthcare, the environment, disaster preparedness and relief, and poverty alleviation. We believe that local knowledge counts: Give2Asia has a team of local staff, in-country advisors, and partners in every country where we work, ensuring projects are effective, results are transparent, and grant recipients are accountable.  Give2Asia is one of the few international NGOs registered to support local causes in China. We are honored to have received special permission from Chinese authorities to accept donations to support local response efforts for this crisis.
 

 Our nonprofit partners in China have provided a preliminary needs assessment. Your donations will be used for:  - Procuring masks, protection suits, goggles, and other necessary medical equipment for the treatment and containment - Providing meals and lodging to the thousands of health workers traveling to areas most affected by the outbreak - Long-term training and support for medical workers working on the front lines of this and future epidemics

campaigns.title: Coronavirus Fundraiser for Wuhan, China
campaigns.description: Hello everyone,  My name is Vivian Hu, and I am currently a senior at Laguna Blanca High School in Santa Barbara, California. I grew up in Wuhan, China. In fact, many of my family and friends still reside there.  Sunday January 26th was the Chinese New Year ‚Äì in our culture, it is the time when people in China are the most lively and happy. It is our practice that everyone puts down their hard work and studies to return home and be surrounded by family and friends. But this Chinese New Year everything changed completely with the outbreak of a new deadly disease commonly referred to as the Coronavirus.¬†  The Coronavirus is a new virus that has been transmitted from animals to humans. The mutation of the virus becomes stronger as it moves on from person to person. The person who is infected with the disease will develop a fever, cough, inflammation of both lungs, kidney failure, and the last stage which leads to death. According to official Chinese statistics, more than 45,000 people have been infected in mainland China alone. Approximately 1,357 people have died from the Coronavirus worldwide, a number that is expected to rise each day.¬†¬†  The Coronavirus outbreak particularly touches me, as well as my friends and family. Most of the infected and diseased people live in my hometown of Wuhan. Due to the sudden outbreak, the hospitals are at full capacity of patients, and medical teams have not received any rest since the outbreak. This virus overlapped with the Spring Festival traffic, causing a series of problems in the spreading of the virus with more human contact. As you may already know, the government made a decision to shut down all pathways leading in and out of Wuhan. Therefore, essentially shutting down my hometown. People will no longer have access to railways, highways, and airports until further notice. This official shutdown has caused the people of my hometown an even greater danger and inconvenience. The people of Wuhan know that the shutdown is not to seal the freedom of life of millions of citizens there, but to prevent the virus from spreading out of Wuhan. The city of Wuhan is taking steps to prevent the spreading of the virus.¬† One, being that the government has built two independent hospitals outside of the city‚Äîwith the capacity to treat 3,000 people.¬†¬†¬†  Because of this nationally-known epidemic, the demand for face masks and protective medical clothing is running critically low. In particular, face masks are out of stock at nearly all of the drug stores in the city and many people are unable to purchase what can potentially save their life.¬†  The money raised by this fundraiser will be used to buy SP Surgical Masks through Wing Sea Co., Ltd. in Japan. There is currently a shortage of face masks available worldwide, but this supplier has agreed to work with me to ensure that medical grade face masks make it to Wuhan. All masks will be sent by the supplier directly to Hankou Hospital in Wuhan, China, where they will be distributed as necessary throughout the community. I am in direct communication with the supplier and will ensure that the money gets to them and that the face masks make it to the Hankou Hospital in Wuhan.  The citizens of Wuhan need our encouragement, support, and help immediately. I ask that you be mindful and show your appreciation as they are sacrificing their own health to ensure that the virus does not spread any further.  As a Wuhan native in the United States, I can only put in my modest efforts.  PLEASE DONATE NOW TO THE PEOPLE OF WUHAN   Thank you in advance for your donation so that I can support my hometown of Wuhan from here.

campaigns.title: help two guys to leave corona virus country
campaigns.description: Hello¬†   Scientists predicted that the Corona virus may kill 65 million people. US health experts have predicted that the Coruna virus will kill tens of millions of people according to a report published in the British Daily Mail. So far, the highly contagious disease sweeping across China has killed 100 people and injured more than 1,771, but experts expect that the true number to be many thousands.   ¬†  The authorities have closed the city of Wuhan, which is the epicenter of the new corona virus. While medical authorities around the world are seeking to prevent its spread.¬†The spread of the epidemic virus, depends on several factors. Including the¬†severity¬†of the disease, the ease of transmission between people, the population density, the availability of health services, and the nature of the place where the disease spread, and movement of travelers. ¬†  ‚ÄúA global health threat‚Äù There are fears that the infection will accelerate as hundreds of millions of Chinese travel at home and abroad during the Lunar New Year holidays, although many cancel their flights. Airports around the world have strengthened screening for travelers from China, although some health officials and experts question the utility of such checks.,   we have lived in south korea for a while for study but we never prepared for something like that and now we are scared to be a victim of the virus , we need some help from you to making an airplane ticket for the come back , its really needed at the moment , and we hope world leaders could make this virus stop soon.  thanks for all your support¬†

campaigns.title: Coronavirus Outbreak Medical Supplies
campaigns.description:
Chinese New Year is supposed to be filled with happiness from family gatherings and celebrations. However, the epidemic of Coronavirus has shattered the joy and infused us with agitation and horror. The virus started from Wuhan and have spread to every single province in China. As more cases are confirmed worldwide, the Coronavirus outbreak has become a pandemic.


Based on the 01/27 report of WHO, 2741 people in China have been diagnosed with the virus, and among these people, 461 of them have progressed to the severe stage. So far, 80 people have died, and 5794 people are suspected of the virus. The statistics are still going up, and everyone is extremely devastated. 


Every hospital in China is packed with patients; all the doctors and nurses have been fighting restlessly on the frontline, but the medical supplies are far from enough. Many doctors are infected, and excessive amounts of hazmats, masks, and goggles are in great demand. 


People who don‚Äôt have the symptoms are trying to prevent the virus by isolating themselves at home. However, many of them don‚Äôt possess any masks or eye goggles to protect themselves because all the masks are sold out, and donations of resources from other countries are imperative. 


I‚Äôm student from Lawrence Academy, and I believe that we, as humans, can all unite together and fight through the Coronavirus. Love is power, and we are full of power when in unity. With your help, we can alleviate the disastrous conditions even if it‚Äôs little by little. Small differences will add up to big changes. On behalf of the Chinese communities, we would like to thank you for lending us a hand through kind donations, and your help will be appreciated and remembered forever!

I‚Äôm going to take the proceeds and donate it to a hospital to help them purchase better medical equipment and to be able to employ more staff that way if the outbreak does continue to spread the way it is then me and you will be more likely to survive. I will also use 15 percent of the proceeds to purchase and prepare my family for this outbreak.

campaigns.title: Wuhan coronavirus: Wirral and UK response.
campaigns.description: We have all heard about the coronavirus outbreak in Wuhan, China. After personally spending 15 years living and working in China and also having a 10year old son in the Country, I know first hand the devastation this virus has caused people. With deaths rising every day and no sign of the virus subsiding, the country is in short supply of vital medical equipment that could be used to save lives. With the elderly and children at greatest risk of developing pneumonia if they contract the virus.  It pains me that my son cannot go to school, play football with his friends or even go to the local cinema but at least he can walk around outside because is fortunate enough to have a face mask. However, there are millions of children and elderly who don‚Äôt have this option and they are housebound 24 hours a day.  Imagine your parents, children, sick relatives not having access to medical supplies that could enable them to leave their house. Simple tasks like buying food and drink, are impossible without face masks or protective eye goggles. The risk of them contracting coronavirus are so high they are now housebound.  A simple facemask could help them safely go to the shops for vital supplies. Imagine being left with the choice of contracting a deadly virus or starving because of a huge shortage in simple precautionary measures .    China is known as super-power in the world, this go fund me is not about money or financial needs, its about supplying urgent medical supplies to areas in the most need. So at the risk of repeating myself, this is not about sending money to China, this is about helping the Chinese people who can not gain access to the most simple of protection equipment.  Schools are closed, businesses have been shut down, children are unable to leave their houses if they don‚Äôt have the appropriate protection.   All donations we receive will be used to buy face masks and protection goggles here in the UK and will be sent to Wuhan directly through the Chinese red cross to help children and the elderly immediately.  ¬£2 can buy a face mask for a child which can help them to just go outside their home.    Please donate anything you can, and know that you are enabling someone to live their life as normally as they can whilst living with the outbreak.  I personally thank you in advance, and I am sure that the Chinese people would also like me to pass on their thanks for any protective equipment that they receive because of your donation.

campaigns.title: End Wuhan Coronavirus.
campaigns.description: China is facing a major virus outbreak. Now, the whole entire population have high demands for medical masks (3M). Not only does the public need these to protect themselves, doctors and nurses are in need for these masks. Medical masks are selling out in China, let's raise money to buy medical masks for the people who need them in the Wuhan crisis.  With more people being admitted to hospitals, the virus is spreading, and doctors and nurses are in need for medical equipment. As doctors and nurses attempt to save patients, masks are very critical to them as they can prevent the virus from spreading. 15 nurses have confirmed to be in contact with the virus due to attempting to save others, but more have yet to come. These people in the medical field are spending time in the hospital saving lives rather than celebrating the 2020 Chinese new year, they should be appreciated and also supported. Not only in the medical field, masks are also worn by the public. These single use masks are bought and thrown everyday, and the demand for these only increase. As many places are in need for masks, I hope to raise money to support hospital facilities in China.¬†  While normal masks are good, we need to buy N95 medical masks. These masks are more safe and are used in hospital facilities. I hope to raise money to buy these masks, then ship them to hospitals in China to save lives.¬†  I hope to: 1) Raise enough money and reach our goal 2) Buy N95 medical masks¬† 3) Ship to Wuhan XieHe hospital, Wuhan Medical Treatment Center (JingYiTan Hospital)) along with other hospitals that need it.¬†  It would be so kind of you for your support, every penny counts. :)

campaigns.title: Antiseptics for hospitals in Wuhan
campaigns.description: Our goal (‰∏≠ÊñáÁâàÂú®‰∏ãÊñπ):¬†  With the situation around the Coronavirus worsening daily, the demand for safety supplies such as hand sanitizers and rubbing alcohol are increasing as you are reading this.¬† Every day more than a thousand people are diagnosed with the Coronavirus worldwide. Attached is a video, a story of a doctor leaving his family to fight the Coronavirus. We are just a group of students from boarding schools in the U.S., and we are trying to help the situation at home.¬† We are becoming more and more concerned about the safety and well-being of our loved ones who are still in China.¬†¬†  With your help, we hope to assist the process of developing a cure through purchasing antiseptics for hospitals in the epicenter of the Coronavirus.¬† We have already successfully reached out to a factory in Shandong province that manufactures antiseptics, around 600 miles North East of Wuhan, who is willing to manufacture extra antiseptics for the hospitals in Wuhan.  We assure you that all of your kind donations will go to the purchase of gallons of hand antiseptics crucial to the medical staff who are battling the Coronavirus on the front line.¬† ¬†  Your kind donation will mean a lot to us, our family members, and those who are unfortunately under the grasp of the Coronavirus.¬†¬†  For any more questions regarding the situation in Wuhan, please feel free to contact us, and we will do our best to answer you.¬†¬†  Sincerely,¬†  Alesia Zhou - Stevenson ‚Äò22¬† Clark Dong - Hotchkiss ‚Äò22¬† Jeff Shan - Stevenson ‚Äò23 Ethan Sun - Berkshire '23 Changyu Wang - Piedmont '20   Dr. Liu‚Äôs story:  https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=IneFBNpi8MU   The outbreak of the n-CoV virus has already affected millions of people worldwide.¬† In search of cures for the Coronavirus, doctors across China have volunteered to be on the front lines of the battle at the epicenter of this plague. In the video we have attached, a forty-four-year-old veteran doctor from the SARS outbreak nearly two decades ago, The Wenchuan Earthquake, The Yushu Earthquake, once-again, left his family in Xi‚Äôan to battle another deadly virus.¬†  The camera crew of South China Morning Post recorded the last breakfast and goodbye shared between the doctor and his wife before he enters the war zone.¬† In the video, the horror in her eyes are visible, and the fear in her voice is audible. She has already done everything she can to prepare her husband for his journey, but she can only do so much.  We also accept donation through Wechat Pay (QR Code pasted at the end of the story) Thank you very much for your support! campaigns.title: GSU:Help Fund Fight Coronavirus
campaigns.description: ÊÉÖÁ≥ªÂÆ∂‰π°Ôºå‰ºóÂøóÊàêÂüé | Ê≠¶Ê±âÂ§ßÂ≠¶Â§ßÁ∫ΩÁ∫¶Âú∞Âå∫Ê†°Âèã‰ºöÂãüÊçêÂÖ¨Âëä  The Spring Festival has come, but a sudden coronavirus has changed the hustle and bustle of the past. The rapidly expanding outbreak has overwhelmed the Chinese province‚Äôs hospitals and fueled fears of a global pandemic.  Chinese health officials reported on 1/24/2020 that there had been 41 deaths from the outbreak and 1287 cases of the coronavirus. Tons of medical workers are still struggle on the front line , the day and night.  Facing the current shortage of medical consumables, Wuhan University Alumni Association of Greater New York has obtained official contacts and approvals with the Chinese Red Cross, the Consulate General of the People's Republic of China in New York, China Eastern Airlines, and major medical consumable manufacturers worldwide.  Overseas payment methods are now being opened, and all-out efforts are being made to open overseas material transportation and fundraising channels. We appeal to all people with kindness, please participate in our crowdfunding!  Gathering sand into a tower, love is boundless! Together we work together!¬†  We firmly believe that with your help, we will definitely win this fight against the disease!  Our alumni will announce the fundraising amount in real time, and ensure that all the funds received will be used to purchase the materials needed to prevent the epidemic. We will announce the progress and whereabouts of materials and fundraising every day. campaigns.title: Micro-Tech Endoscopy For Wuhan Coronavirus Relief
campaigns.description: Dear colleagues,  I would like to start a donation program to purchase some basic supplies for medical staff in China fighting the corona virus.¬†  ¬†You may be well aware of the situation from the news that there are now over 6,000 confirmed cases and 132 deaths from the highly contagious corona virus.¬† The government and entire China are working hard to contain the spread.¬† Public transportations in the city of Wuhan and quite a few surrounding cities in Hubei have been shut down and personnel in and out of the cities are closely controlled.¬† Tens of thousands of physician and nurse volunteers from all over the country have gone to Wuhan to help including some doctors working closely with us in pulmonary medicine.¬† One of them, Dr. Guangfa Wang from Beijing, actually got infected through his eyes in early January when he didn‚Äôt wear goggles and the virus wasn‚Äôt known to be contagious through the air at the time.¬† He has since recovered.¬† Many hospitals in China, especially in Wuhan and surrounding cities are in short supply of the basic protective gear (gowns, goggles and face masks) because of the surge in the suspected cases flooding into the hospitals.¬†   With the help from Seana and Jiefeng, we have been able to locate some supplies (cost around $37K) that we will order and send over to China.¬† I would like to ask everyone to help.¬† The goal for the donation is $10K and  the company will match $2 for every $1 collected .¬† Thank you all for your attention!   Chris Li President of Micro-Tech Endoscopy USA

campaigns.title: Fund to help fight the New CoronavirusÔºÅ
campaigns.description: The new Wuhan Coronavirus is spreading at an unbelievable rate to numerous countries such as Thailand, Korea, Japan, with some cases, even in the US, France, and Australia. As of Wednesday, there have been more than 6500 reported cases in China alone, and more than 132 deaths. In light of the new cases, many are on college campuses, affecting students and younger generations. As a Chinese immigrant, seeing all the immense pain and suffering of people this virus has caused, I have decided to call out and do something, anything, to help! However, only myself is not enough. I am urging everyone that is reading this; please help me raise money to fight against this terrible disease. 100% of the donations will go towards the Hubei Charity Federation for use in treatment and prevention against the virus. Since the Federation is in China and gofundme does not connect with International charities, my mom, Yanjuan Zhen, would have to withdraw the funds to her bank account first,¬† and then donate the money to Hubei. After completing the process, I will send screenshots of the proof of the transaction through email. Thank you so much for your generosity, and have a great day! campaigns.title: Help for friends in China during coronavirus
campaigns.description: Sacramento artist Lin Fei Fei went back for a visit to the countryside in China and has shared with us through Instagram (@linfeifeiart) the state of her home during the coronavirus chaos.¬† At this time she is requesting hand sanitizer and face masks because the stores are running out. They are running out of food at the local grocery stores, and are told to stay in their homes for up to two weeks to avoid coming in contact with the virus. I cannot imagine being in this situation and would like to help in any way that we can.  While this issue seems scary and overwhelming, we can come together as a community to help purchase supplies they are low on, send them to her, and she will distribute them.¬† Even the donation of a couple of dollars could help.  If you have any questions or suggestions about getting supplies there efficiently and quickly, please message me

campaigns.title: Fight the Coronavirus in Wuhan
campaigns.description: My name is Miranda Wang, and I am a ninth-grader at Rumsey Hall School in Washington Depot, CT. My brother is a senior at Canterbury School not too far away, in New Milford, CT. I want to represent my family, and the city of Hangzhou, to raise money for fighting the Coronavirus in Wuhan.¬†  Normally, this is the time for the Chinese New Year celebration. People get together with their family and celebrate all the good things to come in the new year. This year, however, things are quite different. People are not going out to visit their family, barely any celebrations are held, and the city of Wuhan looks dead on the street. This is all because of the coronavirus, as many of you might have heard from the news.¬†  Three times in the twentieth century, coronaviruses have emerged as causes for deadly pandemics: SARS in 2003, MERS in 2012, and now nCoV in Wuhan, 2019. As of January. 25th, the new coronavirus has reportedly led to the infection of at least 2081 people and caused at least 56 deaths. The numbers show no sign of stopping.¬†  While the city of Wuhan has been sealed off, it is reported that at least five million people had left the city hours before the lockdown. We don't know which city they are going, but one thing is certain: that wherever they go, the diseases will continue to spread to all parts of China, or perhaps beyond.¬†  While my brother and I are currently studying in America, we feel a strong sense of connection and empathy for the people in Wuhan, and in other parts of China. My mother, father, and grandma are still in Hangzhou, and we want to do what we can to protect as much people as we can, from being infected with the coronavirus.¬†  I will represent my family, and the city of Hangzhou, to use the money collected to buy and donate high-quality facial masks to Wuhan. I believe that what we are doing is not only to help the people in Wuhan, but also to be responsible for ourselves. Protecting more people from getting the virus will also help reduce the chances of all of us getting infected as well, no matter where we are. I hope that you choose to help Wuhan with me, and I hope our contribution goes a long way. Thank you!

campaigns.title: Corona Virus Stranded Our Girls‚Ä¶Please Help!
campaigns.description: Corona Virus Stranded Our Girls‚Ä¶Please Help!   Our daughter and 4 of her friends went to India for volunteer work and to spend time with the amazing people of India.   Unfortunately, the airline they flew was China Airlines.¬† Their return trip has them stopping in China, however, it appears this doorway has been closed.¬† The outbreak of the deadly Corona Virus has made travel through China nearly impossible.¬† We have tried calling and getting information online, but China Airlines has gone dark on us.  Now we need your help! The girls need to come home in less than 2 weeks.¬† We are trying to come up with the funds to bring them home on a different airline and it looks like we can bring all 5 of them home for our goal of $2,855 ($571 each keeps them clear of China).¬† Will you help open a new doorway and bring them home?¬†   We would like to thank each one of you for your support, whether it‚Äôs a small donation or kind thoughts and prayers, everything helps!  Thank you so much.   P.S.¬† UPDATE...All five girls are in a full time volunteer work and also work part time jobs to put gas in their tanks and cover rent and food.¬† They traveled to India as cheaply as they could and will find it very difficult to add another $571 to their budget.¬† We have made arrangements for a small loan in order to book them on another airline and we don't want you to think that they are stranded, but they all are broke and will appreciate very much anything that helps them to continue enjoying their volunteer work with less stress.

campaigns.title: Striving through the Corona Virus Outbreak 2020
campaigns.description: UPDATE:¬† This request is to help secure supplies for not only myself, but others¬† who are of limited means for the foreseeable future.  * An unprecedented emergency that none of us¬† thought would happen.   * So much has changed since my original post. Many more cities have been asked to institute a quarantine to slow¬† ¬† ¬† ¬† ¬†the progression.   * There are many people, mainly foreigners and especially foreign students who are in difficult situation.  * Work, goods and services are in short supply or non existent.  * Mask are so hard to come by. However, if you have to travel by transportation or go shopping, you cant enter¬† ¬† ¬† ¬† ¬† ¬† ¬† ¬†without them, so this magnifies the problem.  I want to use these funds to provide mask and money to those who are not earning an income because businesses are shuttered, so people can eat and move around.¬†  There are so many who because they cant work, cant leave,cant buy food and are slowly facing a dire situation.  We hope you can help to make life a little less stressful for those who are really limited.¬†  We do hope this will pass soon, but it will take months for things to get back to normal.¬†  If you need more information, or have any questions, please feel free to contact me through this platform! Finally thank you again to those who were able to help, it is greatly appreciated!!

campaigns.title: Help Doctors Battle Coronavirus!
campaigns.description: All donations will be used to purchase goggles, masks, surgical gowns, and other supplies for hospitals in Hubei. Should you wish to donate supplies directly, please directly contact Chelsea Feng ( cfeng20@priorypanther.com ). Thank you!!   The Wuhan Coronavirus, the most severe disease outbreak China experienced since the 2003 SARS, drastically escalated during the Lunar New Year, the most important festival in China and comparable to Christmas in Western culture.  Up till 12am January 24, 4535 cases have been confirmed in China, and the number is doubling every day. 106 patients have died from the virus. The live update of the disease could be found here:  https://www.nytimes.com/2020/01/28/world/asia/china-coronavirus.html.  School breaks are extended, public transportations are curtailed, and Wuhan, the origin of the virus, is quarantined.   Doctors in Hubei (the province of Wuhan) are working overtime in this Holiday season, but shortages in surgical supplies put them in extreme dangers of exposure to the virus. Please donate to help the doctors in China to fight this battle and keep more people alive! !

campaigns.title: CoronaVirus Donation
campaigns.description: Want to join us in making a difference? I'm raising money to benefit CANADA-CHINA CHILD HEALTH FOUNDATION and the affected people due to¬† Corona Virus. Any donation goes towards this organization and will help make an impact. Thanks in advance for your contribution to this cause that will change the whole world.

campaigns.title: Save our World From CoronaVirus
campaigns.description: Summary  An outbreak of the 2019 Novel Coronavirus from Wuhan, China, has caused more than 100 deaths in China, with nearly 8,000 cases confirmed in the China. Corona virus has not yet been reported in Sierra Leone, even though there is a strong ties with China. The virus is spreading worldwide and cases are now being confirmed in Africa. The World Health Organization has declared it a world health emergency. Help and support are urgently needed to fight the spread of this fatal infection and to prevent it from becoming a global epidemic. Our goal is to save the lives of our school children, their families and communities.   Challenge  Containment and treatment of the pneumonia-like virus is critical. The novel corona-virus is spreading rapidly. Hundreds of Sierra Leonean do business and studies in China, and may be unknowing carriers and spreaders of the virus during their movement or when Chinese ships dock in the country. With little education, the virus can spread quickly with destructive impact to our people. The need for education while this is still not the case is urgent and the time is now!   Solution  Donations to this fund will support awareness efforts and services before communities will be affected. Funds donated will be used: ¬∑¬†¬† To produce and distribute thousands of educational flyers and leaflets, bulletin boards to schools and communities including farmers and petty traders ¬∑¬†¬† Conduct school and small community educational meetings ¬∑¬†¬† Social media, Radio and TV discussions ¬∑¬† ¬†Purchase and distribution of Soaps, Sanitizers and water bottles to students and schools, water buckets and cups to schools and communities, sanitary pads to girls during menstruation ¬∑¬† ¬†Emergency arrangement provided for a suspected carrier  ¬†Your donation will reach thousands of local school children and their communities on how to detect symptoms, what to do in order to prevent transmission and how to practice health precautions when a case starts to appear.    Long-Term Impact  We believe that our organization is deeply rooted in local communities and we are in the best position to raise awareness and sensitize the populace to work together to help stop the spread of this deadly virus and any other crises. By funding this campaign, it will have a potential to build stronger response capacity, to face future outbreaks. We will post reports about how funds have been used to donors. The health and wellness of our school children and their communities is paramount. With very high education and awareness, if an outbreak happens, the virus spread will be contained and damage will be minimal.

campaigns.title: Stop the Corona Virus. Its in England as well.

campaigns.title: Donation Against Coronavirus for Er Zhou Hospital
campaigns.description: This fundraising is for purchasing medical protective gear and donating them directly to Er Zhou No. 2 Hospital. Since the beginning of the virus crisis, Wu Han has been the city that caught the world's attention. However, there are many other less known cities that also got effected and desperately need medical protective gear. Er Zhou is a small city that's 30 min away from Wu Han. Due to its close distance, the city has diagnosed over 100 cases in less than two days. The Er Zhou No.2 Hospital is the official hospital for treating the coronavirus patients but will run out of medical protective gear soon. All the hospital staff is risking their lives in battling the virus and need all the help they can get from everyone else.¬†   The Er Zhou No.2 Hosptial is the beneficiary of this fundraiser. We have a family member working at this hospital and staff are desperate needs the medical protective gear to help them dealing with infected patients.¬† The fund will be transferred to my banking account and will be used to purchase medical supplies then directly send them Er Zhou No.2 Hosptial.¬† The whole process will be transparent and updated as we progress through the campaign.¬†  Ê±ÇÂ§ßÂÆ∂Â§öÂÖ≥Ê≥®‰∏Ä‰∏ãÊ≠¶Ê±âÊóÅËæπÁöÑÂüéÂ∏Ç - ÈÑÇÂ∑ûÔºÅ‰∏¥ËøëÊ≠¶Ê±âÔºåÂè™Êúâ30ÂàÜÈíüÁöÑË∑ØÁ®ãÔºÅÈÑÇÂ∑ûÊÄ•ÂàáÈúÄË¶ÅÊîØÊè¥ÔºÅ ÈÑÇÂ∑ûÊòØÁ¥ßÊå®Ê≠¶Ê±âÁöÑÊπñÂåóÊúÄÂ∞èÁöÑÂüéÔºåÂÖ®Â∏Ç‰∫∫Âè£‰ªÖ100‰∏áÂ∑¶Âè≥„ÄÇÊà™Ëá≥1Êúà30Êó•ÔºåÂ∑≤ÁªèÁ°ÆËØä123‰æã‰∫ÜÔºåÊ≠ª‰∫°2‰æã„ÄÇÂ∏åÊúõÂ§ßÂÆ∂ÂèëÂä®Ë∫´ËæπËµÑÊ∫êÁà±ÂøÉÊîØÊè¥ÔºÅÔºÅÔºÅ Ê≠¶Ê±âÂë®ËæπÂüéÂ∏ÇÂåªÁñóËµÑÊ∫êÊûÅÂ∫¶Áº∫‰πèÔºåÂë®ËæπÁñ´ÊÉÖÂ∫îÂΩìÂºïËµ∑Á§æ‰ºöÊõ¥Â§öÁöÑÈáçËßÜÂíåÂÖ≥Ê≥®

campaigns.title: Help End the Coronavirus Supply Crisis!
campaigns.description: Please join us during this time of urgency with our cause to aid hospitals in the prevention and control of the virus. The money we collect will go directly to a the DFW based chinese organizations that are currently buying and shipping surgical masks, ¬†protective masks, ¬†and gowns directly to Wuhan's hospitals. ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ Video footage of the dire situation in Wuhan's overcrowded hospitals have appeared all over the Internet. ¬†Another video circulating on social media appeared to show covered dead bodies lining hospital hallways. While a disturbing clip that was also shot at a Wuhan hospital shows a patient writhing around on the floor desperately scattering money around. (Source: New York Post) ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ Wuhan China- One week into lockdown, anger, resentment and panic ¬†has taken over China. ¬†Frustrated citizens are left untreated and hospitals are overcrowded.¬† Meanwhile, ¬†doctors are pleading for supplies, which are quickly disappearing, as the center of the virus endures shortages of hospital beds, ¬†medical supplies and resources. ¬†According to the ¬†New York Times,¬† "These shortages have become especially severe in Huanggang, a city of seven million not far from Wuhan, where some medical staff members were wearing raincoats and garbage bags as shoe covers to protect against infection."¬† Anotherstaff member from the Guangzhou hospital ¬†has reported, ¬†¬†"There were 40 companies in China that made the suits, and their combined daily output was about 30,000. However, Hubei province alone needed about 100,000 protective suits every day." ¬† Hospitals in Wuhan are seeking medical supplies including some 40 million medical masks, 5 million protective suits and more infrared thermometers. "Many people have contacted us but the problem is, we can't find the supplies," said the employee.   Sources: The New York Times, AsiaOne ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~   EpochArts4Hope is an organization dedicated to changing the world through the music and the arts. Our hope is to create an epoch of joy through the power of what we do. We are looking to host a fundraiser concert showcasing music, dance, martial arts, and more to raise money for the coronavirus situation of 2020. If you know of a potential venue that we could use for this cause, please feel free to contact us at epocharts4hope@gmail.com. Thank you!

campaigns.title: CLOSED: Fight CoronaVirus in Hubei, China
campaigns.description: Thousands of people have been affected with CoronaVirus in Wuhan and nearby cities in Hubei Province. Medical workers are under great danger in fulfill their duty helping others. Raise funds of 20,000AUD to purchase N95 masks and medical protective clothing locally in Sydney and ship for the doctors and nurses. They have raised request for help! Our hearts with the Doctors and Nurses in Hubei!  As per the request of GoFundMe, I am providing more details about this campaign.  My name is Colin Hu (Zhichao). I am a Chinese expat working in Australia. My home town is Jingzhou, Hubei, a city around 200km away from Wuhan. Maybe as not as so known to people in Australia, Jingzhou is suffering from the corona virus greatly. Til today (9 Feb), the city has 941 confirmed cases, with 56 added to the list today. My sister works in Jingzhou No. 1 People's Hospital as a doctor in Department of Respiration. She has been in the isolated wards for the confirmed patients for the last 10 days. I am encourage by her and all the medical workers to have this fundraising to provide medical protective masks and¬† coveralls for them. The donation will go to Jingzhou No.1 People's Hospital through Hubei Charity General Society (official receipient).  We have purchased already 1304 pcs of DuPont Tyvek 800J coveralls and we are still seeking available stuffs from Australia and US. We now have a Wechar group and volunteers have been assigned to different tasks like sourcing materials, logistics arrangements like cargo booking, custom clearance, dispatch and others, while also work as team.  The 1st batch of medical coveralls have been shipped to China on 30 Jan, and arrived in the hospital on early morning 2 Feb. We have received appreciation and gratitude from the hospital and Hubei Charity General Society.  Thank you all and we are still fighting against the corona virus.  We will keep you updated.

campaigns.title: Together - Support Wuhan Fight Through Coronavirus
campaigns.description: Dear all,  We urgently need your help and donation! YES, We need help ASAP!  This Gofundme page is setup to help fundraising for purchasing medical supplies for Wuhan hospitals, doctors, nurses,¬† healthcare workers,¬† medical microbiologists, volunteers in Wuhan, China whose currently fighting to save all these innocent lives. Yes, we know the virus spread too quickly for anyone to react. We know the cause of the virus and we know there are human responsibilities in this BUT not everyone deserves to be infected or die.¬†  Wuhan was once my home when I was a child and I still have family there. Unfortunately, 2 of my close family members including¬† a healthcare worker are currently isolated in hospital in Wuhan suffering from the coronavirus. We are lucky that they received treatment. We are lucky that we had these healthcare workers to save them! We are grateful, and we are heart broken at the same time, because we know how serious this is and we are still experiencing the possibilities of loosing close family members we want to help! And we need your help! We want every doctor, nurse, healthcare workers, medical microbiologist, volunteer, and patient to go home safely! I am lucky, I live in USA currently, I am lucky that I did not get stuck in Wuhan city because I no longer live in Wuhan. I am lucky I have so much resources! But whose there to help them, and the true heroes?  Currently, my cousin who was a reporter in Wuhan is in direct contact with many hospitals bypassing government or other organizations. Yes, we want to make sure that every pieces of supply gets delivered directly to the hospitals! We need to help and protect the frontline fighters whose risking everything to save our family and my home.¬†  Due to Wuhan city and many other cities lockdowns, shortage of supplies, increased pricing on these supplies set lots of restrictions and limitation. In Wuhan, China, we raised about $10000 and purchased only 600 pieces of protected clothing delivered to assigned hospitals.¬† This is truly NOT ENOUGH...Therefore, our family decided to connect together at this tough time to raise more fundings to help even if the prices are expensive...these medical supplies are life savers!¬†  Right now, flights no longer go to Wuhan and due to varies of other reasons, even if we ship supplies to Wuhan, it does not get distributed to the needed hospitals. So we have to purchase and gather the supplies in China! To make sure we get the required high quality supplies, we need more funds to purchase them. We will guarantee to purchase the medical supplies and deliver them directly to each hospitals that we work with. We already completed round 1 so we know this works! That's why we want to continue!          Many people are in lockdown in their community in Wuhan, Hubei,¬† other areas in China so we have to depend on these warm hearted volunteers to help us move and deliver these items to hospitals! We need to protect them too!!!!!¬†       And IF you have resources or supplies in Wuhan and China, please please contact me and I can link you up with my cousin. During this time, please stop the discrimination to Wuhan people. We know human beings made mistakes, other organizations did too but we should stop blaming and hating, we should stick together to help! We need to have a kind heart and generous actions to support! Even if is just a little help, even if you could just help me share the page, we truly appreciated! And we are thankful for everyone whose helping and praying to get through this tough times!¬†  We know there's lots of different voices, political views, fake supplies etc. BUT let's put that all aside and just focus on one purpose, HELP and SUPPORT Wuhan and save innocent lives! Inside Wuhan City, we¬† truly are still in urgent need of supplies!  Please find the news links to see more details about the coronavirus.   https://www.cnn.com/2020/02/01/asia/coronavirus-wuhan-discrimination-intl-hnk/index.html     https://www.wsj.com/articles/what-we-know-about-the-wuhan-virus-11579716128       https://www.worldometers.info/coronavirus/    Please contact me through Gofundme if you have resources or supplies in China!¬†  I would like to thank everyone in advance!  Anna

campaigns.title: Corona Virus
campaigns.description: The Centers for Disease Control and Prevention (CDC) is closely monitoring an outbreak of respiratory illness caused by a novel (new) coronavirus first identified in Wuhan, Hubei Province, China. Chinese authorities identified the new coronavirus, which has resulted in thousands of confirmed cases in China, including cases outside Wuhan City. Additional cases have been identified in a growing number of other international locations, including the United States. There are ongoing investigations to learn more.

And that we care!

campaigns.title: Helping Hong Kong through Coronavirus
campaigns.description: ÊàëÂÄëÊòØ‰∏ÄÁæ§‰æÜËá≥È¶ôÊ∏ØÁöÑÁæéÂúãÁïôÂ≠∏ÁîüÔºåÂæóÊÇâËøëÊúà‰æÜÂú®È¶ôÊ∏ØËÇÜËôêÔºåÁ¢∫Ë®∫ÂÄãÊ°à‰∏äÂçáËá≥13ÂÆó„ÄÇ ÁÑ∂ËÄåÊîøÂ∫úÊ≤íÊúâÂÅöÂ•ΩÂ∞ÅÈóúÁÆ°Âà∂ÂèäÈò≤Á¶¶Êé™ÊãñÔºå‰ª§Á¢∫Ë®∫ÂÄãÊ°àÊåÅÁ∫åÂ¢ûÂä†ÔºåÂè£ÁΩ©ÂèäÊ∂àÊØíÁî®ÂìÅÂæó‰∏çÊáâÊ±Ç„ÄÇÂæàÂ§öÂ∏ÇÊ∞ëË¢´ÈÄºËá™Ë£Ω‰ΩéÈò≤Á¶¶Âè£ÁΩ©ÊàñÊ≤íÊúâÊà¥Âè£ÁΩ©ÊÉÖÊ≥Å‰∏ãÂ§ñÂá∫„ÄÇ  we are a group of students who study in the United State, we have realized that the situation of coronavirus in Hong Kong is getting serious and the number of confirmed cases has risen to 13 cases in this short period of time.¬† However, the Hong Kong government has not done a good job in the custom control and coronavirus defense measures, which cause increasing the number of confirmed cases and the demand for face masks is overwhelmed. Which many Hong Kong citizens are forced to self-made and low-defense mask or go out without wearing masks dangerously.      Êñ∞ÂûãÂÜ†ÁãÄÁóÖÊØíÊúÄÊó©Êñº12Êúà‰∏≠ÁôºÁèæÔºåÈ¶ôÊ∏ØÊîøÂ∫úÂçªÂàªÊÑèÈö±ÁûûÁñ´ÊÉÖÂèäÊåÅÁ∫åËÆìÂÖßÂú∞ÊóÖÂÆ¢ÈÄ≤Ê∏Ø„ÄÇÁõ¥Ëá≥‰∏çË∂≥‰∏ÄÂÄãÊúàÂÖßÁñ´ÊÉÖÊì¥Êï£Ëá≥Â§ßÂçäÂÄãÂúãÂ§ßÈô∏Ôºå‰∏≠Âúã‰∫åÂçÅ‰∏âÂÄãÁúÅÂú∞ÂçÄÁôºÁèæÊñ∞ÂûãÂÜ†ÁãÄÁóÖÊØíÔºå‰∏≠ÂúãÂ¢ÉÂÖßÊ≠ª‰∫°ÁóÖ‰æãÂ∑≤Êúâ213‰æãÔºåÁ¢∫Ë®∫ÁóÖ‰æã9692‰æã„ÄÇÂú®Ê≠§Âö¥ÈáçÊÉÖÊ≥Å‰∏ãÔºåÈ¶ôÊ∏ØÊîøÂ∫úÊõ¥‰∏çÂñÆÊ≤íÊúâÂÆåÂñÑÊáâËÆäÁñ´ÊÉÖÁöÑÊé™ÊñΩÔºåÊ≤íÊúâÊèê‰æõË∂≥Â§†ÁöÑÈÜ´ÁôÇÁî®ÂìÅÔºå‰∏¶Ë¢´ËøëÊó•ÁôºÁèæÊîøÂ∫úÊúâ‰∏ÄÂçÉËê¨ÂÄãÂè£ÁΩ©Â∫´Â≠òÔºåÂçªÊ≤íÊúâÈÅ©Áï∂Âú∞ÂêëÂÖ¨ÁúæÊ¥æÁôºÔºåÂ∞éËá¥‰∫∫ÂøÉÊÉ∂ÊÉ∂„ÄÇ  This new type of coronavirus was first discovered in the middle of December, but the Hong Kong government deliberately concealed the epidemic and continued to allow mainland tourists to enter Hong Kong. Until less than a month, the epidemic had spread to more than half of the continent, and new coronaviruses were found in 23 provinces of China. There were 213 deaths in China and 9,692 confirmed cases. In this serious situation, the Hong Kong government has not only failed to improve the measures to respond to the epidemic, has not provided enough medical supplies, and was recently discovered that the government has a stock of 10 million masks, but it has not properly distributed them to the public, causing people panic.    Credit: Billy H.C. Kwok  ÊàëÂÄë‰ΩúÁÇ∫‰∏ÄÁæ§Âú®ÁæéÂúãÁïôÂ≠∏ÁöÑÂ≠∏ÁîüÂæàÊÉ≥ÁÇ∫È¶ôÊ∏ØÂá∫‰∏ÄÂàÜÂäõÔºåÊàëÂÄë‰∫ÜËß£Âà∞ÁõÆÂâçÈ¶ôÊ∏ØÂçÅÂàÜÁº∫‰πèÂè£ÁΩ©ÂèäÊ∂àÊØíÁî®ÂìÅÔºåÊàëÂÄëÂ∑≤ÂêëÊúâÈóú‰æõÊáâÂïÜËÅØÁπ´ÂèØË≥ºÂèñÂ§ßÈáèÂè£ÁΩ©(N95 respirators Âèävirus filtration efficiency masks)ÂèäÁâ©Ë≥áÈÅãÈÄÅÂà∞È¶ôÊ∏ØÂêÑÂçÄÂèäÂ§öÈñìÈ¶ôÊ∏ØÂ§ßÂ≠∏ÈôÑËøëÊ¥æÁôº„ÄÇÊàëÂÄëÁöÑË≥áÊñôÂ∞áÂÖ¨ÈñãÂèäÈÄèÊòéÔºåÁèçÊÉúÈ¶ôÊ∏Ø‰∫∫ÁöÑ‰∏ÄÂàÜ‰∏ÄÊØ´Ôºå‰∏¶ÊåÅÁ∫åÂêëÈ¶ôÊ∏ØÊîØÊè¥Áâ©Ë≥á„ÄÇÊàëÂÄëÁöÑÂäõÈáèÂæàÂº±ÔºåÂõ†Ê≠§ÊàëÂÄëÊÉ≥ËóâÊ≠§ÂáùËÅöÈ¶ôÊ∏ØÂèäÂÖ®‰∏ñÁïåÁöÑÂäõÈáèÔºå‰∏ÄËµ∑Ëµ∞ÈÅéÈÄôÊÆµÈõ£Èóú„ÄÇ We, as a group of Hong Kong people in oversea, would like to contribute as much as we can to Hong Kong. campaigns.title: CoronaVirus advantages
campaigns.description: As many of u know, disaster has struck again. All I was doing was innocently helping the brave shluchim in Beijing, China when the cruel Corona virus made its way into our lives. Changing everything... forever. We were forced to leave our home, our people, our comforts. We did what we had to. We listened to minds, rather than our hearts.  We set out with a ‚ÄúNaaseh Venishmah‚Äù state of mind, just following orders. We began our journey in Combodia, Southeast Asia, only planning to be there for a nice and explorative seven days. But as the saying goes; ‚Äúman plans and god laughs‚Äù. To our complete surprise, we are compelled to continue traveling and wandering through the world for at least another month. As some may find this as a blessing in disguise, we are in utter dismay. We miss our home in China, we are hungry, and we are broke. We were thrown this curve ball, leaving us homeless in a third workout country.  Please, we strongly urge u to generously open ur wallets to us money and help us get through this. Your donation will go to an outstanding cause. It will be used to fund our ‚Äúkosher‚Äù food, nights out , and all our bathing suits.  With much thanks, Rivkah g ‚ù§

campaigns.title: COVID19 AWARENESS AND PREVENTION FUND(AFRICA)
campaigns.description: Since the start of the corona virus epidemic in china a record number 14300 people have so far been infected with 305 succumbing to the virus¬† as of 02-Feb-2020 with media reports indicating the figures could be way higher than reported. With suspected cases reported all across the globe and confirmed deaths outside china the epidemic is foretasted to escalate leading to increased morbidity and mortality across the globe. Putting in mind¬† challenges such as the modes of spread ,the virulence of the COVID19, the lack of proper information and absence of protective¬† gears for the poor;problems which are made worse¬† by misinformation, myths ,religious beliefs and traditions. It is high time we rise to the occasion and help counter the spread of the epidemic through provision of protective gears for those in need, creating awareness on the signs and symptoms, modes of spread and prevention strategies while fighting misinformation.

campaigns.title: Urgent support to fight Coronavirus
campaigns.description: As we all know the current situation in Wuhan is deteriorating every day due massive outbreak of corona virus which has resulted in loss of many lives.¬†  Most of the people who were helping the sick and infected were unaware that the disease can also transmit through eyes.  Currently there is a shortage of face masks in that city and many are reusing old masks which is very dangerous.¬†  I personally have sent over 500 high quality 3M N99 masks last week to woman and children.¬†  With your donation i will directly procure and transport even more masks to those who are trapped in Wuhan.  Together we¬† can help countless people by donating to this campaign.

campaigns.title: Coronavirus Defends for Saving Suffering Lives
campaigns.description: Flight with us! Pray with us! I‚Äôm such an ordinary person quiet on social, I never thought I would be so desperate and devastated to draft a letter for help with face covering in tears! This January with the  outbreak of Coronavirus  at Wuhan my hometown‚ù§, I realized and is experiencing such a life-threatening moment for my family who are infected with the virus and hundreds of thousands of people are suffering this novel virus with pneumonia and hard to breath problem (China‚Äôs number is less than what‚Äôs real). They are on the fringe of fighting the virus through their own Immune Systems and Antivirus/antibacterial medicines with the city under quarantine, but the  sad thing is they lack medical supplies of masks, goggles, protection suits  to prevent the virus  from transmission to more people at the hospitals and communities at Wuhan  (even they also lack medicines, since those are prescription drugs there is no way we can purchase). Even though lots of people are trying to help in this matter including myself and my husband, there still lots of things we need to do and lots of supplies we need to send to China. As you may know Alibaba, Taobao those big online stores in China is sold out of masks, goggles, we are purchasing  supplies here at US to send back to China . Since its two of us on our part, we realized its wiser and better if we can collect help from the humanitarian society to help accelerate the process. If you are there and willing to help this effort, any dollar or connection with those supplies is welcomed! I attached all those first-hand information and the real moments of my friends circle on Wechat (a Chinese chat tool) to show you what‚Äôs really going on. And with all the dollars raised I‚Äôll  buy those supplies  and reply this crowdfunding with the  purchasing sheets and shipping information  to show how your money goes. Please also  send prayers  for Wuhan, I believe God can hear us! It‚Äôs near the time to re-examine ourselves and the world around us. 1.¬†¬†¬†¬†¬†¬† Who I am: Xinyu born at Wuhan, have been living at US since 2012 Fall came here for Graduate degree  2.¬†¬†¬†¬†¬†¬† Where I‚Äôm from: Wuchang District, Wuhan City, China  3.¬†¬†¬†¬†¬†¬† Relationship with parties raising funds: Family friends community hospitals in Wuhan. My father is hospitalized at Wuhan University Renmin Hospital, my grandpa is at Wuhan Tianyou Hospital. My mom and grandma currently don‚Äôt have any spots available at the Hospital.  4.¬†¬†¬†¬†¬†¬† The Fund spent: will all be used for purchasing supplies like masks, goggles, protection suit and ship back to Wuhan.

This fund will support community needs, identified during the corona virus outbreak and will be evenly dispersed between health, housing, research, and relief for victims of this pandemic in the United States.

campaigns.title: Source Medical Supplies to Fight Corona Virus
campaigns.description: As of 2nd Feb, the confirmed cases of Corona Virus Patients worldwide are approaching 15,000 fast, with possible further escalation and outbreak explosion in next 5-7 days. One of the bigger problem in China now is the lack of medical supplies. The doctors, nurses and patients at the front line hospitals are running out of Medical Coveralls, Surgical Masks, Face Shields and Protective Goggles. The protective gear most in demand is the protective clothes (Medical Coveralls). It is so crucial to protect the medical staff and it takes so much longer to manufacture. This is not to mention the broader community in China are not able to buy any of those. There is also ad appearing in Chinese social media and online market to buy back used face masks to recycle, which has upset lots of people. I am not here to ask for your donation. Of course you are most welcome if you feel generous. We have raised some money offline and the problem is the purchasing channel has been dried up. We don‚Äôt know where we can buy these medical supplies. I am asking for help, if you are a medical equipment supplier, or if you know anyone who works in the industry and willing to help, to get in touch with me. I have listed the items that are desperately in need. I am asking your help to prioritise our order, work overtime and manufacturing the goods as soon as possible. Again, we are not asking you to donate them, we will pay for the goods. We will then post them directly to the front line hospitals in Hubei Province in China, NOT VIA ANY NGOs. Thank you very much! Leo Wang.  Below link is the latest update.  https://news.ifeng.com/c/special/7tPlDSzDgVk

campaigns.title: Doctors Treating Coronavirus Request Support!
campaigns.description: In need of: goggles, protective clothing, n95 surgical masks, surgical masks, disposable surgical masks, caps, operating clothes and shock masks. (see below for details)  The protective materials are consumables, which are used by front-line medical staff every day.   With the money raised I am going to buy and send N95 respiratory face masks along with other medical supplies to doctors in China who are caring for patients with Coronavirus. Some of the doctors at hospitals like Tongji Medical College and Zhongnan Hospital in Wuhan have had to create their own masks out of whatever materials that are available. The small thin masks are not good enough, and the N95 masks are only standard. They also need protective clothing and goggles. Please consider donating so that I may purchase and send as many materials as I can to the doctors who are treating this virus.  In need of:  3,000 protective suits 5,000 medical N95 masks 8,000 surgical masks 3,000 disposable isolation suits 1,000 protective masks (only for reference - the more the better!)  Send materials to: 1277 jiefang avenue, jianghan district, wuhan city, hubei province Hospital contact is hu qiushi: 13707162353  *Donated materials must meet the national clinical medical standards or import standards.* All donated materials shall be approved by the department of hospital sensibility before being sent to clinical use. Chinese medical protective masks: GB 19083 2010 N95 respirator: NIOSH certified, filtration efficiency of non-oily particles: 295% European N95 mask: European FFP2 standard KN95 mask: China GB 2626 mandatory standard, filtration efficiency of non-oily particles: 295%  Surgical mask: YY 0469-2011 (surgical mask) Protective clothing: GB19082 2009 "technical requirements for disposable protective clothing for medical use", medical protective clothing above grade 2 (with red and blue stripes on the general clothing) Goggles: Medical Safety Goggles/Protective Eyewear class 2 and above.

SAVE WUHAN FROM THE DEADLY CORONAVIRUS!¬†  Coronavirus,  a newly discovered illness that can evolve, infect humans, and spread between humans, is threatening hundreds of millions of people‚Äôs life. Currently, there is  NO  cure for this illness. According to the government‚Äôs report and the New York times  live update ¬†, the death toll and diagnosed infections increase rapidly every hour.   Even worse, there is a shortage of medical supplies, food, and support to local businesses in China due to the speed of the spread of such virus. Tens and hundreds of hospitals all over China a running out of face masks, protective suits, and medical goggles. campaigns.title: Perkins Will Shanghai Coronavirus Relief Fund
campaigns.description: PW Shanghai is significantly impacted by the current public health emergency. We create this campaign to raise money as an emergency fund to help PW Shanghai employees and others in need with essential medical supplies during this difficult time as the virus continues to spread globally.  The authority has required all local corporates to extend the Lunar New Year Holiday and we‚Äôre expected to work at home in the coming weeks. As the infected and suspected number continues to climb in the city, the protective gears (N95 face masks or surgical masks, safety goggles) that have been proven effective to halt the spread are running low. We‚Äôve been collecting such supplies from various sources to ensure the safety of our PW employees and any help from you means a lot to us.  If you would like to donate, PW Shanghai team have created this page to raise money, and your donation will be used to purchase face masks and safety goggles, as well as other essential medical supplies, and ship to our PW Shanghai office ASAP, helping PW shanghai employees, their families and others in need in Wuhan, as well as contributing to the efforts of stopping the virus from taking more lives.

campaigns.title: To Combat Disease,  Let's End Corona Virus
campaigns.description: To date, there are over 20,500 confirmed cases of novel coronavirus (2019-nCoV) that are affecting over 24 countries in the world.¬†  Despite the hard work of medical staff, there are still over 400 deaths reported around the world and the number is growing.¬†  This virus is indifferent and it can affect me, you and our loved ones. Please join me in this fundraising campaign to help the ones in need and end the coronavirus.  To help with this cause, I will be giving away a free hand sanitizer from Bath and Body Works to people living in Calgary, with the donation amount of $15.00 or more. Pick up will be available on Sunday, March 1 with the time and location TBA.¬†  Let's work together to raise money to combat this virus, and spread awareness to the people around us so we stay safe and healthy. All donations raised will go towards the Canadian Red Cross and help make an impact on this virus. Thank you in advance for your contribution!

campaigns.title: Help me escape the Corona virus.
campaigns.description: Hello,   I'm currently living in the Guangdong province in the South of China. As many people know, the Coronavirus has gripped the country here. My entire province is on lock-down (more or less) until the middle of February 17th, with talks of extending it to March.   Food on the store shelves is scarce right now and there is little information about the situation. Right now, my employer is refusing to pay our salaries until we return to work, so I'm short on funds and flight prices out of China, when they aren't cancelled aren't always cheap.  I'm seeking help to get myself out of China on the next available flight back home. The Gofundme is going entirely to the cost of travel and to cover survival expenses while I sort out when I'll be able to return to work.

campaigns.title: We will beat Coronavirus! Fight for Wuhan
campaigns.description: We are SPARK Republic, an organization of the Chinese American community. Our mission is to use Chinese culture as a carrier to promote social progress and build a spiritual home for Chinese Americans. Our three focuses are based on love, inherit culture, and focusing. The first focus is love, which means we‚Äôll be organizing social events-such as fundraising, donation, teaching children living in hills--in order to spread the love to the community. The second is based on culture inheriting. As Chinese Americans, we also have projects and activities to promote Chinese culture and art. Thirdly, we will focus our spirit and mission, creating a welcoming and helpful environment/community for Chinese American students. In the future, we will be reaching out to different states and China to help plan trips, college applications, and internships.   On behalf of our Spark organization, our goal is to help Wuhan, China and we have the responsibility to help those who have been affected by this deadly virus, which is circulating all around the world. According to the New York Times, in Wuhan, there are already more than 14,000 people affected, and more than 300 have died from this severe virus. Not only in China, but the United States so far has shown 8 cases with one of which hits in the bay area. With the severity of this disease, we want to help by holding a Go-Fund-Me fundraiser to provide supplies for the affected people in Wuhan and their scarcity in medical supplies.   We will beat Coronavirus! campaigns.title: Let Us Fight Corona Together
campaigns.description: After the World Health Organization‚Äôs (WHO) declaration that Corona outbreak has become a Public Health Emergency of International Concern, it is now everybody‚Äôs responsibility to fight the disease.  As a data scientist, I am working with my colleagues on extracting and cleaning data from the WHO reports¬† on a daily basis. This allows us to build an interactive dashboard to communicate information about the disease outbreak to specialists who will in turn help us understand how the disease evolves around the world. Also, this information is available to the general public in simplified terms.  Your funds will be very supportive to continue improving the dashboard by analyzing the data from different perspective in order to communicate more information about the epidemic outbreak and to fight the rumors that some people try to spread about the disease. campaigns.title: Fundraising for Coronavirus Wuhan China!

A scarcity of critical medical supplies such as N95 face masks, protective goggles, protective suits and other medical grade equipment is contributing to the increased number of people, including health professionals, exposed to this dangerous disease. Death tolls are rising and we must act fast!  As Chinese across Toronto Ontario Canada, we are reaching out to all of our communities, their friends and families to ask for a hand in aiding the efforts of Chinese medical professionals to combat this virus.   We have launched a fundraising for the City of Wuhan to prevent cross-infection and curb the spreading of the coronavirus. Funds raised will be used to buy necessary supplies for epidemic prevention or to be donated to other charity organizations to fight the coronavirus directly.   We will announce the fundraising amount in real time, and personally ensure that all the funds received will be used to purchase the materials needed to prevent the epidemic. We will announce the progress and whereabouts of materials and fundraising every day.   Thank you for all your support and contribution! Every penny counts! campaigns.description: So the story began when my friend and his family went to Kazakhstan on Christmas holiday, they were there for about 6 weeks and these people are the best people I know they would do anything for anyone and the kindest family ever. So I when my friends family came back they just wanted to go home and rest but while what they didn‚Äôt know is my best friends little brother Ruben caught the corona virus. My best friend sleeps the room away from Ruben so he was easily in reach of catching the virus but luckily he didn‚Äôt. Now Ruben is in extensive care and near passing away. My family and his family and the whole community around us is devastated about what has happened and definitely does not deserve to one kind innocent young boy this is why I‚Äôm fundraising for a and 100% of all the money will be put to research on the corona virus ! PLEASE SPREAD AWARENESS !

campaigns.title: HELP FIGHT CORONAVIRUS
campaigns.description: For people who love sports, last week was a rough beginning for 2020. On the one side, NBA legend Kobe Bryant passed away at age 41; this was heartbreaking news in China as many esports fans share a love of basketball. Meanwhile, China braced itself for a difficult Chinese New Year (CNY) due to the new coronavirus outbreak.¬† ÊÉÖÁ≥ªÂÆ∂‰π°Ôºå‰ºóÂøóÊàêÂüé | Ê≠¶Ê±âÂ§ßÂ≠¶Â§ßÁ∫ΩÁ∫¶Âú∞Âå∫Ê†°Âèã‰ºöÂãüÊçêÂÖ¨Âëä The Spring Festival has come, but a sudden coronavirus has changed the hustle and bustle of the past. The rapidly expanding outbreak has overwhelmed the Chinese province‚Äôs hospitals and fueled fears of a global pandemic. Chinese health officials reported on 1/24/2020 that there had been 41 deaths from the outbreak and 1287 cases of the coronavirus. Tons of medical workers are still struggle on the front line , the day and night. Facing the current shortage of medical consumables, Wuhan University Alumni Association of Greater New York has obtained official contacts and approvals with the Chinese Red Cross, the Consulate General of the People's Republic of China in New York, China Eastern Airlines, and major medical consumable manufacturers worldwide. Overseas payment methods are now being opened, and all-out efforts are being made to open overseas material transportation and fundraising channels. We appeal to all people with kindness, please participate in our crowdfunding! Gathering sand into a tower, love is boundless! Together we work together!¬† We firmly believe that with your help, we will definitely win this fight against the disease! Our alumni will announce the fundraising amount in real time, and ensure that all the funds received will be used to purchase the materials needed to prevent the epidemic. We will announce the progress and whereabouts of materials and fundraising every day. Government support The two institutes that discovered Shuanghuanglian's alleged ability to "inhibit" the coronavirus are both state-run bodies. The Shanghai Institute of Materia Medica is under the Chinese Academy of Sciences (CAS), a top government think tank. The Wuhan Institute of Virology is also¬†administered by the CAS¬†and is among the country's most advanced virus research laboratories. Thousands of people have been sickened by a new coronavirus, called 2019-nCoV, in at least a dozen countries, including the US. Coronaviruses attack the respiratory system, sometimes targeting the cells deep within the lungs. Only seven, including 2019-nCoV, SARS, and MERS, have evolved to infect humans.

campaigns.title: Raising money for Coronavirus
campaigns.description: Deaths from coronaviruses have quickly surpassed with no sign of stopping or slowing down. A further 24,324 people on the Chinese mainland have been infected China's National Health Commission said on Wednesday. It has now spread to the U.S and is infecting American citizens with 12 cases already confirmed.¬†   Our Mission   For the past month, China has been suffering in a new epidemic known as the coronavirus. Our goal is to raise money and buy supplies and directly send them to Chinese hospitals for use and treatment on patients due to the lack of supplies. The lack of equipment/supplies, workers, and space in hospitals is inadequate and needs to be helped ASAP. We will try to aid and try to slow down the spread of coronavirus in China because America is better suited to handle these outbreaks then China.   Êàë‰ª¨ÁöÑÁõÆÊ†á   Âú®ËøáÂéªÁöÑ‰∏Ä‰∏™Êúà‰∏≠Ôºå‰∏≠ÂõΩÊ≠£ÈÅ≠ÂèóÁùÄ‰∏ÄÁßçË¢´Áß∞‰∏∫ÂÜ†Áä∂ÁóÖÊØíÁöÑÊñ∞ÊµÅË°åÁóÖÁöÑÊäòÁ£®„ÄÇÊàë‰ª¨ÁöÑÁõÆÊ†áÊòØÁ≠πÈõÜËµÑÈáëÂπ∂Ë¥≠‰π∞ËÄóÊùêÔºåÂπ∂Áî±‰∫éÁº∫Â∞ëËÄóÊùêËÄåÁõ¥Êé•Â∞ÜÂÆÉ‰ª¨ÂèëÈÄÅÁªô‰∏≠ÂõΩÂåªÈô¢‰ª•ÂØπÊÇ£ËÄÖËøõË°å‰ΩøÁî®ÂíåÊ≤ªÁñó„ÄÇÂåªÈô¢Áº∫‰πèËÆæÂ§á/‰æõÂ∫îÔºåÂ∑•‰∫∫ÂíåÁ©∫Èó¥‰∏çË∂≥ÔºåÈúÄË¶ÅÂ∞ΩÂø´ÂæóÂà∞Â∏ÆÂä©„ÄÇ    Who we are   We are an organization that originated in Michigan, and we are a group of students who want to help the world. As a result, we are starting with the coronavirus epidemic in China. We have lots of passionate people in our organization that want to help reduce the number of casualties in the rapidly spreading coronavirus outbreak.   Êàë‰ª¨ÊòØË∞Å   Êàë‰ª¨ÊòØ‰∏Ä‰∏™Áî±È´ò‰∏≠ÁîüÂú®ÂØÜÊ≠áÊ†πÂ∑ûÊàêÁ´ãÁöÑÁªÑÁªáÔºåÊó®Âú®Èò≤Ê≠¢ÁñæÁóÖ‰º†Êí≠„ÄÇÊàë‰ª¨ÁöÑÁªÑÁªá‰∏≠ÂÖÖÊª°‰∫ÜÁÉ≠ÂøÉ‰∫éÂ∏ÆÂä©‰∫∫‰ª¨ÁöÑ‰∫∫‰ª¨ÔºåÊàë‰ª¨ÂÜ≥ÂÆö‰ªé‰∏≠ÂõΩÂºÄÂßãÔºåÂπ∂Â∏ÆÂä©‰ªñ‰ª¨Âú®ÈÇ£ÈáåÁàÜÂèëÂÜ†Áä∂ÁóÖÊØí„ÄÇ    What we will accomplish   We will fund hospitals in China that don‚Äôt have enough room for patients or require more supplies. Some examples of equipment and supplies that we give are gloves, face masks, and more medical supplies. We will fund the hospitals so that they can get more money to expand and make rooms for their patients. The money we raise and will send to them will also be used for hiring more workers to ensure that most, if not all, of the patients, can be treated in time and not die waiting for medical help. campaigns.title: Corona Virus - Help  doctors and nurses in China
campaigns.description: Hello Everyone!  My name is Tina and I am a Chinese born Australian. I was born and raised by the very mothering land of China and as I feel the need to do something to help my motherland to overcome this terrifying Crisis!  As I work in the health care industry for the past 12 years, I travel to Chinese hospitals often, and I have a vast amount of channels to receive most up to date news. It is now WuHan hospitals that are most in demand of these medical equipments, there are more than 30k confirmed diagnosis, and much more infected. The hospitals in Wuhan are already OUT OF surgical masks and protective gowns, unfortunately, the government is also in shortage.  Your donations will be spent to purchasing N95 masks, procedural masks that has 99% bacterial filtration rate, and medical/surgical gowns which I have already sourced from. With the existing amount funded, I have already purchased (out of my own pocket for now until gofundme allows for withdrawal) 1100 procedural masks, 100 N95 masks and 50 surgical gowns. Note that there are still 350 gowns, 900 N95 masks and 4900 procedural masks available for purchase before they get sold out (which will happen in less than a couple of days), I need your support to ensure that our Chinese front line fighters are protected while they serve their patients.¬†  My friend will then bring back all these gears in person from Sydney to Beijing on 12th Feb and that is when the fundraising will stop.   Chinese Doctors and Nurses are currently treating tens of thousands of infected patients using recycled (washed in disinfectant solution) surgical masks, and lab coat‚Ä¶‚Ä¶‚Ä¶. as there are NO MORE protective gear left for use!  So many of them are infected EVERYDAY, and then they go home and infect their family members. Every time I read a story, I am in tears‚Ä¶‚Ä¶¬†  Please chip in and help out to the first line Hero and Angels!  I thank you very much in advance! Tina  To update on the most recent progression of this activity (07Feb2020) - I have successfully sourced 1100 Procedural masks and 180 N95/P2 masks ready for shipping. - I am awaiting to receive 50 surgical gowns and am looking for more, if anyone has resources for medical equipments, please reach out to me on 0450225004.   UPDATE on 10Feb2020:   Thank you all so very much my dearest Chinese brothers and sister, together, we have made a total of almost 9000 over the past 5 days!! This is unreal!!  As many of you would have noticed, that the donation was disabled as of last night. The reason for this is because we have saturated existing stocks that we could get hold of, and the campaign needs to close prior to 11th Feb as all stocks will depart to Beijing on 13Feb.¬†  Having said that, I have obtained 2 more potential resources as of last night, and with successful establishment of both connections, and confirmed supply, the Campaign maybe reopened again, so please watch the space.  Wish me luck :)  All the very best to Chinese civilians...and hope that the outbreak will not be worsened with the end of the holiday period, today. ..

campaigns.title: Conquering Coronavirus- Rice Business School
campaigns.description: Hi All- as you may have heard, the China Coronavirus has reached over 31K cases as of today. This 2019-nCoV is easily transmitted via human-to-human interaction. As a Chinese, I feel so devastated everytime when I hear that another family friend passed away or another friend got infected. My mom works in the hospital and has to put her life on the line to reuse expired face masks everyday. This is why so many health care workers got infected. The infected areas are urged to use medical supplies such as face masks and protective clothes. This is now the only way to slow down the virus spread. We would like to share this conquering 2019-nCOV campaign with you  https://www.gofundme.com/f/ConqueringCOV  Your donation will be collected and used to purchase protective gear to help those infected areas and stop the virus from spreading worldwide. Your support is well appreciated.  To tell you a bit more about our fund: We are student organization at Rice Business School in Houston, TX. This Campaign has been approved and supported by Rice Jones Business School since Feb 5th 2020. We have contacted the alumni initiated group in South California that collects the fund from top universities in US to support the coronavirus in China. Attached the charity group information in the picture below. The fund will be directly transferred to the group mentioned above. The procurement team will purchase the healthcare supplies and ship back to China in the next few days once the money is received.
