campaigns.title: Broken Corona Sign
campaigns.description:
I don‚Äôt know where to start... it was the night if Thursday, Febuary 6th. I was hosting a medium sized gathering at my home in Narragansett, RI. Everything was going fine, and then it happened. A drunk girl smashed into my beloved corona sign, ending its life prematurely. The neon tubes shattered, and the palm tree shined its last light. Heartbroken would be an understatement. 

Can you find it in your heart to make up for this girls mistakes? Any amount helps, we need to get this sign fixed so that our house can be restored to its former glory. While money may ease the pain, nothing could ever fix the loss that all of us here at 9 feel in our hearts. Have a blessed day.

campaigns.title: Crona Strong! Please help Robert in his fight!
campaigns.description: October 16, 2019 everything changed for Robert Corona, loving husband to Rachelle and father to Rae, Joey, Elijah and Nessa when they found out he had¬† Stage IV Colon Cancer  at the age of 36.¬†¬† From that moment Robert has said he will beat this! Robert has a large extended family and friends who we know will be right beside him loving and fighting with him!   ¬†Hitting the ground running they decided to start curative treatment as fast as they could. With 3 months of chemotherapy, surgery ¬†and another 3 months of Chemotherapy. He and his family will need our support and love as he embarks on this journey. There are many ways we can rally around Robert and his incredible family: prayers, meals, love and financial support.¬†    This means giving up a few things He loves and enjoys for the near future, like his job and little league. Robert has been a loyal hardworking employee for Berryessa Union School District for the last 18 years, a job which he has excelled at. He is well respected and loved at his job even being awarded employee of the year for all his hard work.¬†    Robert has since stepped down from being President of Berryessa Little League a passion of his, since his diagnosis.Robert has been an active part of little league since he first coached his daughter Rae in 2007 at North Valley. ¬†In 2008 he started coaching for Berryessa Little League where he coached all of his kids, his nephews and countless children. ¬†His loving sprit was always noticed on the field from racing the kids around the bases with 60 of his work keys clipped to his belt. Maintaining the fields for the league and at countless board meetings. If you didn‚Äôt see him coaching or working on the field you could find him umpiring games .¬†    Robert is one of the easiest people to love and friend in minutes. ¬†He is the only person I know who makes friends every single place he goes. Robert can walk into a party not knowing one person and by the end of the night he has made friends with everyone there making plans to see them again. With his outgoing and joking personality who wouldn‚Äôt want to be his new friend. He would also give the shirt off his back and if you need any help he‚Äôs the first to volunteer without you even asking. ¬†He has the ability to make you feel as if you‚Äôve known him for years even after only just minutes of knowing him.    Robert also loves his wife Rachelle who he has been with for 20 years. He‚Äôs a family man through and through You see that love and devotion in his 4 children. ¬†His family is the most important thing to him. ¬†Cancer will not stop him from doing anything and everything he can for them.   Anyone who knows Robert knows how loved he makes everyone around him feel. Through this journey Robert, Rachelle and kids will need our help. Robert and Rachelle will both be out of work during this (Robert being the main provider)and have lots of added expenses with lots of doctors visits, tests ,medicines special diet, gas and care along with their regular monthly expenses. All donations will go directly towards these things. Please help us make their next few months a little easier with one less thing to worry about. ¬†Every little bit helps and we can‚Äôt thank you enough in advance for your love and support.¬†    The road to recovery will have its ups and downs but we know that we will all rally around Robert, Rachelle and kids with any and all support we can give! ¬†    Remember rule #1 from Coach Robert. ¬†Have fun and always give 100%!!¬†     THEY WILL BEAT THIS!  ¬†   If you‚Äôd like to help support them in any other way please email chellelarae430@gmail.com   #CRONASTRONG ¬† #YOURFIGHTISOURFIGHT

campaigns.title: Corona Virus
campaigns.description: Corona Virus spread in China now. ¬†A lot of people in China ask my help including my relative, friends and unknown people. However, I have limited resources to help those large group of people request even if just a simple N95 Mask. It is a global village , I need your help of any dollar amount to help those victim in China, I promise that every dollar will be spend on those people in China

campaigns.title: Help Vietnam fight through Coronavirus
campaigns.description:
English version:

     My name is Quang Pham, a sophomore in high school who has recently moved to the USA to study.
     As you are already aware of, the whole world has been concerned about the newly rise yet dangerous virus called coronavirus (Covid-19), which creates lung problems. Originated in Wuhan, China, the virus has spread throughout every continent, infecting more than 75000 people with 2009 killed as of February 19, 2020. The World Health Organization has declared the virus ‚Äúa global threat.‚Äù And we need to help those in need of basic medical supplies to prevent the spread of the virus.
     I want to address this issue to my home country, Vietnam, which declared the novel coronavirus outbreak an epidemic on February 01 with 16 people infected so far. Here, although many people are aware of the disease and try to take precautions, there are some ‚Äì especially THE POOR - who do not have the fair chance to access the most basic safety. Because of the virus, the cost of face masks has risen dramatically; worse still, they are out of stock in many areas due to different reasons. The situation creates a huge disadvantage for the needy. I am organizing this fund to buy masks from the U.S. and give them to the people in poor areas in Vietnam which are currently facing a huge shortage of masks.
     My goal is to get $2,500 for this fund; and we need to act quickly since the price of masks is changing constanly due to the shortage. The money will then be sent to a doctor that I have contact with to buy masks; then the masks will be sent back to some friends of mine in Vietnam who will help me distribute them to poor people. To start, I will donate $200 and I hope you will act quickly as well. Thank you for your consideration. Every penny counts!

campaigns.title: Kidd Corona and Lizz (Romero)
campaigns.description:
Our Very own Kidd Corona from 107.5 Outlaw Country and his beautiful wife¬†Lizz just had a baby girl. She was premature, born with congenital  heart¬†¬†disease consisting of three holes in her tiny ¬†heart. Mia will be in the neonatal care unit for¬† months. ¬† The goal is to get her strong enough to  endure heart surgeries and post surgical recovery.¬†  When it rains it pours, Lizz is suffering from a  condition that has her off her feet. Now this shouldbe all a person could handle at once, right? Well on  top of everything¬†their son Timmy broke his leg in a ¬†freak trampoline accident. ¬†
 

 Which brings me to the ask. Kidd is the only one  able to work, care for Lizz and carry Timmy aroundThey have to drive daily to Albuquerque for a  limited visit they are allowed¬†with Mia. Kidd is  carrying a heavy load right now.¬†Please help us  help him during this difficult time ¬†Anything you  can do will be appreciated. We want to help cover all the unexpected¬†costs for gas, childcare, meals, hotels, etc.¬†Thank You all so much for¬†everything ¬† you can do.¬†
 

 ¬†

campaigns.title: Impact Youth Club  for Wuhan - Fight Coronavirus
campaigns.description: As you may have already seen on the news, a recent outbreak of the coronavirus has already hospitalized at least 31,211 people and has caused at least 637 deaths ‚Äî with the vast majority of these cases identified in Hubei, China, where the first case of the virus was discovered.¬† These numbers are still growing everyday.¬† Healthcare workers are desperately trying to keep citizens healthy, but supplies are needed to help contain the outbreak, treat patients, and protect front line workers.  This gofundme page is set up by IYC and Zongfan Liu from Princeton, New Jersey with the goal of raising money for healthcare workers in my hometown,¬† Wuhan China who is currently in urgent need of safety protective equipment due to the aforementioned reasons.¬† We will be sending the funds received to my affiliated Wuhan University Alumni Assocation of Greater New Work, who will then purchase and ship coveralls (Tyvek suits), respirator masks, goggles, and face shields to hospitals in the Hubei province of China.  All proceeds will be withdrawn and be deposited to Zongfan Liu's personal account first.¬† ¬†As soon as Zonfan Liu receive the fund, she will send a check payable to Wuhan University Alumni Association of Great New York within 2 days.¬†    To¬† learn more about the coronavirus outbreak, visit   https://www.who.int/emergencies/diseases/novel-coronavirus-2019    To learn more about Impact Youth club, visit   https://www.impactyouthclub.com/

campaigns.title: NYC Carpenter Raising Money for Coronavirus
campaigns.description:
Want to join in making a difference? NYC carpenter are raising money to help with Coronavirus , and any donation will help make an impact. Thanks in advance for your contribution to this cause that means so much to me.

Bishop‚Äôs Central Storehouse workers load supplies as The Church of Jesus Christ of Latter-day Saints sends¬†aid to China in Salt Lake City on Wednesday, Jan. 29, 2020. Respirator masks, protective goggles and protective suits were sent.

‚ÄúThese are our dear brothers and sisters,‚Äù President Nelson said in a statement, ‚Äúand we feel privileged to be able to offer some small measure of help. We pray for them, and know God will bless them.‚Äù
Project Hope already had a plane flying out of Atlanta with other supplies. The church added 12 pallets of the protective gear to that flight.

The coronavirus is a new virus with no vaccine or treatment, and finding a vaccine will take months. Please join us and help. Thank you So much and God bless you!

campaigns.title: Nashville Double Tragedy - Tornado & Corona Virus
campaigns.description:
My name is Michael Gray and I'm homeless here in Nashville. A few weeks ago a tornado hit Nashville killing 8 homeless people as it tore through the Jefferson Street bridge homeless camp, destroying all the tents there and displacing a lot of people. Most of the resources we relied on to get by were now focused on the victims of the tornado who lost their homes; and rightfully so. 
 

 Now we have the flu pandemic and we still have not recovered from the tornado. Most of the resources we depend on closed down because of the flu and we have been unable to get needed supplies now for weeks. The homeless camp I stay in has a lot of people with mental health issues who are homeless by no fault of their own. Most are unable to head into town to find help even if there was a place to go. I have been here for almost 6 months helping make sure everyone has what they need and it is now very difficult. 
 

 We need supplies. Mostly water and food but we also need propane for cooking and for heat at night and batteries and flashlights. Essential items that we cannot get by without. Other problems most people don't realize we have being homeless are things like money to wash bedding and clothing and to purchase shoes, socks and new tents. If it wasn't for a few amazing people that have sent food and water, I don't know how we would have gotten by so far.
 

 If you can help, we need it. I would be able to purchase and distribute supplies where they are needed most if we had some funding, so please donate a few dollars if you are able. If not, please check on your neighbors even if you don't know them. Or ask someone who looks distressed if they need help. Because it's the right thing to do and a small act of kindness can travel through the hearts of dozens of people, and change the world. 
 

 Thank you, 
 

 Michael Gray - Founder of H.E.A.L. "Helping Escape Addictive Lifestyles" 615-541-3661

campaigns.title: COVID-19 adding to the struggle
campaigns.description:
We need emergency help with rent , bills and car payment. We have been given a short time to pay the late payments on our rent or we have been asked to move out. We have no place to go and no money to move if we had to leave. Had to stop Lyft driving which is my only source of income to protect my 82 yo mother who lives with me. No income for two or three weeks will really hurt our already drastic situation. If it goes longer than 3 weeks I am sure things will be so bad for us and many other families. Trying to get assistance to keep us in the house we are renting, but I know the landlords need to pay their bills too. Any help would be gratefully appreciated.¬†
My 82 yo mother who is in fragile health came to live with me in 2016 to make things easier on her and give her a better place to live and enjoy the rest of her life. She has survived breast cancer and is now needing new dentures but the dentist has major concerns that mom's lower jaw is too thin to get new dentures. So she is waiting to get into an oral surgeon to see if there is anything they can do. She has been on antibiotics to clear up a chest cold or infection in her sinuses that makes her cough and labors her breathing. 
Mom's recent pain in the area where her breast was removed was examined by a doctor who ordered more tests. The tech that did her ultrasound said that she thought everything was looking okay. Hopefully the doctor will review the test and agree.

To buy N95 masks and then transport to Wuhan by air!  Express companies have been found to transport to Wuhan's major hospitals by drone after the masks arrive at the Chinese airport!  Let us help Wuhan!  Help Wuhan fight against coronavirus!  thank you allÔºÅ

campaigns.title: Help during the CoronaVirus outbreak.
campaigns.description:
As most of you know I recently moved to Vietnam to start a new chapter of my life. ¬†Once my father passed away I knew even more-so that this change was needed in my life.
 

 It‚Äôs something I was so desperate to do not only to change my life for the better, ¬†but to make myself and my family proud. Each day I wake up thankful tobe here, thankful that I went through with this dream and continue to make my dad proud.¬†
 

 Since the CoronaVirus decided to appear, not only has the world come to a stop still but also my mind and mental health as abruptly come crashing down. So much so I‚Äôve contemplating giving up this dream completely, so much so that Im sleep depriving myself, so much so that anxiety and panic attacks have become second nature. Then I think about leaving again, something I know will make me feel like an even bigger failure. During this outbreak it has left me uncertain of how I might continue to not only have a roof over my head, ¬†but cover basic needs such as food and water. The virus has stopped all schools from opening, which in turn means us teachers are left with nothing. As it stands the schools are not due to open any time soon which does mean basic living necessities will be something I no longer have access to. Food and water will no longer be a viable option, let alone having somewhere to live.¬†
 

  All I‚Äôm asking for is help, in any way shape or form. Every penny counts, and I will use whatever funds are raised to cover living expenses as well as manage to feed and water myself. Any further funds that I manage to raise will goto a charity that helps individuals in crisis situations. I don‚Äôt expect anyone to donate however if you choose to, just know that i am beyond grateful. I will forever be truly thankful ‚ô•Ô∏è

campaigns.title: Join Shaolin Temple CA  in Combating Coronavirus!
campaigns.description: Join Shaolin Temple of Canada in combating coronavirus.    As coronavirus continues to spread across China and around the world, the situation in China has become critical.   ¬†There have been over 37 558 confirmed cases as of February 9th and the people are in urgent need of medical supplies, specifically masks and other equipment designed to contain the virus and to protect health care workers.   ¬†Fortunately, there are ways in which we can all help. Under the direction of the Venerable Shi Yongxin, the Shaolin Temple of Canada has set up a GoFundMe campaign in order to help streamline relief efforts. All those who feel called to exercise compassion in these difficult times can contribute to this campaign with the knowledge that 100% of the proceeds will go towards the purchase and transportation of medical supplies to Shaolin Temple in Henan, China where they will be distributed to hospitals and communities in need.   ¬†Supplies include but not limited to the following: N95 masks, Disposable hospital surgical masks, Disposable ordinary masks, Protective Masks Goggles, Protective Clothing Disposable Hospital Gloves.   ¬†Together with your generosity and compassion, we can stop this virus by helping those who are actively combating this virus as well as support and protect those who are the most vulnerable.  ¬†We hope you will join us in the struggle that affects all mankind.  ¬† Âä†ÂÖ•Âä†ÊãøÂ§ßÂ∞ëÊûóÂØ∫ÂíåÊñáÂåñ‰∏≠ÂøÉÔºå‰∏éÂÜ†Áä∂ÁóÖÊØí‰ΩúÊñó‰∫â! campaigns.title: Aid for Wuhan Against Novel Coronavirus
campaigns.description: Wuhan, located in Hubei province, was hit with a devastating virus at the beginning of January. Since then, the numbers of those infected and died have grown exponentially, killing over 600 people with another 30,000 infected. The effects of the novel coronavirus are very evident throughout China seen with roads being blocked, major cities being quarantined, and hospitals being inundated with thousands of cases. This surplus of patients has led to an extreme shortage of supplies that are necessary for the doctors to treat the sick, including face masks, medical goggles, and hazmat suits. As this virus is relatively new, not much is known about it yet making it unpredictable and threatening.  This is why we need your help. There are over 98 million people living in the epicenter of this outbreak with no way out, making it an extremely dangerous situation for them. Even a donation of $5 is sufficient to provide aid to those on the frontlines battling the coronavirus. I have partnered with the ACP Foundation and the North Texas Hubei Association who will be able to ensure supplies can be shipped to the Hubei province as soon as possible. All proceeds will be donated towards North Texas Hubei Association who has sellers to purchase the supplies from (face masks, gloves, sanitation suits, etc.) to distribute to various hospitals in the Hubei province. This association has already delivered 10,000 medical gowns, 35,000 face masks, and 1,875 protective goggles to Hubei Province. The situation in China is worsening and they need all the aid they can receive. Please support us as we join ranks with the citizens of Wuhan and fight against the Novel Coronavirus. If you have any questions, feel free to send me an email ( gianna6818@gmail.com  or Angela Huang at  angela.huang13@gmail.com ).Ê≠¶Ê±âÂä†Ê≤π!

campaigns.title: Wnhan Corona Virus Mask Relief Supplies
campaigns.description: Hello. I'm "Jae Hoon" living in Korea. I am poor at English.  So if you use a language machine, please understand.   Thank you.  Currently, the Wnhan coronavirus is a very large threat worldwide. It's more dangerous than the Ebola virus, which was deadly years ago. The infection is very high, and today in China, it's a deadly evolution of human-to-human infections. I didn't take it seriously because I thought it was happening in China. However, over time, many felt infected and felt that they did not look at the current situation.  I investigated, but the situation was serious.  I wanted to help China and the country of the infected. But I do not have the knowledge of making vaccines. Currently, China and countries with infected people are said to be very short of masks and hand sanitizers.  Currently, foreign traders have purchased large quantities of high-grade masks in Korea. They sell at very high prices in their own country.  The cost of a Korean mask is $ 0.25. They sell at least $ 3 to up to $ 6 in their home country. The average income of a family in China is $500 a month.  It is very unfortunate and sad.  Currently, some parts of China are isolated when they are rich or poor or not wearing masks. If the number of infected continues to increase, all countries will be in danger.  So I want to help China and the infected country and the future. I will make a mask factory with my money. I will send relief goods to every country that needs a mask for free. But I have money that only makes factories.   Start fund-raising for mask parts purchase   Please.    I do not want the situation of Wuhan Coronavirus to get worse. And help people who are poor and cannot buy masks. I will build the factory early. And I'll make a mask and send it to many countries as a relief Help me. For the country and the world. If help is difficult. Tell your friends and family about this.      Thank you for reading this long article.

campaigns.title: Raising Money to Combat the Wuhan Corona Virus
campaigns.description: Novel Coronavirus(2019-nCoV) is a new respiratory virus first identified in Wuhan, a big transportation hub in China. The virus is highly contagious and it's appearance during the peak of Chinese New Year has allowed it to spread to other cities. It has now passed SARS in deaths, and is several times more infectious in its spread.  As of February 9, 2020, according to the government's report in China, 40,710 people have been diagnosed with coronavirus, 23,589 people are suspected of being infected and 910 people have died.   These numbers increase every day, and there have been no signs of slowing down. It is threatening the lives of hundreds of millions not only in China, but around the world. China estimates that the peak of the infection rate will be around mid-February, the most difficult time has yet to come. In all Chinese cities, schools are delayed and all public facilities are shut down.  Due to the unexpected outbreak, hundreds of millions of Chinese people's lives are at stake.  Items such as: masks, goggles and protective suits which are used to combat the spread of this disease are high in demand but low in supply. We need your help to fight against this devastating illness.  We're working with Chicago NW suburban Chinese Christian Church which is in connection with a Wuhan Church to organize the purchase and shipment to the hospitals in need. All money raised is going to be used to purchase those medical supplies for doctors in Wuhan. With your help, we will make sure that doctors will have access to needed supplies in order to prevent the spread of the disease and save more lives.

campaigns.title: DONATE MASKS TO WUHAN FIGHTING CORONAVIRUS

2019 Novel Coronavirus (2019-nCoV), first detected in Wuhan, China, is identified as the cause of an international outbreak of potentially fatal respiratory illness. The highly contagious virus spreads from person to person via respiratory droplets produced by the infected and contact with them.

campaigns.title: Help Hubei Province Fight Coronavirus
campaigns.description: Ivy International Group (IIG), in partnership with our international education community, including all who support our students, is facilitating a fundraiser for the  Hubei Charity Federation (HBCF).  ¬† HBCF works to support those impacted by the Novel Coronavirus in Hubei Province, the center of the crisis and the most severely hit so far.   This is a matching gift campaign.¬† IIG will match -  dollar for dollar  - all donations received up to $15,000. All donations received will go towards this effort.  To date, February 12th, the outbreak has affected hundreds of thousands of people. There have been over 43,000 confirmed cases and 800 deaths worldwide. The World Health Organization (WHO) has declared it a  Public Health Emergency of International Concern ,¬†help and support is urgently needed.  The Hubei Charity Federation - a China-based humanitarian aid organization - is working tirelessly to contain this virus and protect the world. The donated funds will be used in the efforts to fight against the virus and treat patients in Hubei Province.¬†   Coronavirus is the common enemy of every human being across the world. As an individual, we can do so little - but together we can make a real impact. Our contributions will have real significance for those suffering and working to contain and fight the virus in Hubei Province.¬†  Remember, Ivy International Group will match - dollar for dollar - all donations received up to $15,000!   Thank you for your contribution and please share this page!   All the best, The Ivy International Group Family   More information on the Hubei Charity Foundation can be found on¬†  http://www.hbcf.org.cn/  . campaigns.title: Corona virus Relief 8B
campaigns.description: Do you want to join me in making a difference? I'm raising money for the people affected by the Coronavirus, I will be donating all money to Coronavirus relief stations.

campaigns.title: Corona Virus Closes Schools; Teacher Needs Help
campaigns.description: I started this campaign for a friend who is a teacher in Japan. His name is Paul Melnyk. Due to the Japanese govt's attempt to prevent the rapid outbreak of the Corona virus they have closed all schools for an indefinite time which will certainly lead to financial hardships for Paul during this time. It is my intention to attempt to facilitate financial relief for him through this campaign until the schools reopen.¬†  I understand that millions are being affected by this current crisis. I am stepping up to help meet the needs of a dear friend who I know is personally affected by the Corona virus outbreak. Many thanks to any who can contribute to this campaign.

campaigns.title: El Corona del Angel Short Film
campaigns.description: Hello everybody! We are trying to raise money for a student short film called 'EL CORONA DEL ANGEL'. this film is inspired by a true story. It's¬†about a kid who is rejected by an extremely traditional mother for being gay that she ultimately believes that he was possessed by a demon.¬† With your help we will be able to get what we need for our actors such as food, transportation, etc.¬† We extremely appreciate your help!

campaigns.title: Defeat COVID-19 with portable protection
campaigns.description: With the continued epidemic's coming from China,  SARS-CoV ,  Bird Flu  (H5N1),  Middle East Respiratory Syndrome  (MERS) and now  COVID-19  we need a device that can protect people from airborne viruses.¬† This would also help eliminate the yearly flu, when used with proper precautions, such as washing your hands.¬† I have already developed, patented and tested the cartridge idea, but now need to make it a reality for personal use.¬† I started working on the idea when the SARS outbreak happened, but as all great ideas, personal life gets in the way.¬†   The original idea was for a room sized device that could protect a large area.¬† I called it the UVBioClean.   This is still valid but the cost to manufacture is higher and there is still a higher chance that it would not filter the virus in the placed room, or in travel before it could make contact with someone. For this reason, I would like to take the same principles and design a small personal device, that could be carried (similar to cell phone), and could be used everywhere. I need your help to bring this to reality!¬† With the proper amount of funding and moving forward with all previous work, time and money spent, I believe we can make such a device that can be affordable and practical to use everyday and SAVE LIVES!¬† ( Death toll from the CoVID-19 already at 3,043 with 88,948 infected globally )     All studies are scientifically proven and so a personal device could be as small as a can of soda, using a USB charge port/battery to provide power. This is a reboot of many years of work and concern for the health of everyone that are effected every year by the flu and then the OUTBREAKS of unknown killer viruses that come from around the world. To build such a device is the humane and practical idea that could be disseminated to everyone who is susceptible with low immunity to all airborne viruses know today. (AIDS, elderly, cancer treatment, etc.)¬†¬† I will be needing to find a smart team of design engineers (already have some concept ideas), manufacturing, developers, etc...    We need to start now, as the re-design (small device), prototype and manufacture process takes time and we need to get this personal safety device distributed to many people to STOP the spread of the virus and save lives!    Watch a dramatization of a virus being destroyed within the cartridge.      UVC destroys the viruses ability to propagate, it makes it sterilized. The DNA of Virus Destroyed!       https://www.who.int/emergencies/diseases/novel-coronavirus-2019/situation-reports/

campaigns.title: China citizens corona virus protection
campaigns.description: Having recently returned from China, living with the lockdown of communities due to the spread of the corona virus, it became apparent that there was insuficient supplies of facial masks to reduce the spread during daily life. I have started sending masks to citizens in China as I can find them locally, they are distributing them to those in need. I am compassionately asking for your help in this urgent time. So far, we are lucky here in the US, but those that are trapped in this situation need our help. Please find it in your heart to help these people in need.

campaigns.title: CTIA Wuhan Coronavirus Relief Fund
campaigns.description: Wuhan coronavirus outbreak has nearly 12,000 confirmed infections and caused half of China to shut down. As the spread of the deadly virus is still accelerating,¬† more and more people are sent to despair due to the lack of access to medical help and their income sources.  ¬†Chinese Trading and Investment Association , a registered nonprofit organization in the US, together with  Fudan Alumni (Chicago) Association ,  PKU (Chicago) Alumni Association ,  Chicago-ND ,  University of Chicago Booth School Alumni Association, Chinese American Association of Central Illinois, ¬†is organizing this relief fund to help those people. All the fund will be used to provide medical supply and life support to areas severely affected by the pandemic.  This is a phase II campaign for our Coronavirus relief effort. Out phase I campaign successfully raised $32,563, which was solely used to provide emergent hospital supply to Wuhan Xiehe Hospital. See our Phase I campaign:¬†  CTIA   FAA fundraising for Wuhan ¬†  Ê≠¶Ê±âÊñ∞ÂûãÂÜ†Áä∂ÁóÖÊØíÁöÑÂèëÂ±ïÊÑàÂèë‰∏•ÈáçÔºåÂ∑≤ÁªôÂêåËÉûË∫´‰Ωì„ÄÅÂøÉÁêÜÂíåÁªèÊµé‰∏äÈÄ†ÊàêÂ∑®Â§ßÊçüÂ§±ÔºåÁñ´ÊÉÖÁöÑÂèëÈÖµÁâµÂä®ÁùÄÊàë‰ª¨ÊØè‰∏Ä‰∏™‰∫∫ÈÉΩÂøÉÔºÅ  Âçé‰∫∫‰∫§Êòì‰∏éÊäïËµÑÂçè‰ºöÔºàCTIAÔºâËÅîÂêàÂ§çÊó¶Â§ßÂ≠¶ÔºàËäùÂä†Âì•ÔºâÊ†°Âèã‰ºö‰∏ÄÂêåÂèëËµ∑ÁöÑÊîØÊè¥Ê≠¶Ê±âÂÄ°ËÆÆÂæóÂà∞Á§æ‰ºöÂêÑÁïåÁöÑÂπøÊ≥õÊîØÊåÅÔºÅ‰ªé1Êúà23Êó•ÂèëËµ∑Ëá≥‰ªäÔºåÊàë‰ª¨Â∑≤ÁªèÁ¥ØËÆ°ÂãüËµÑ$33,073ÔºåÂÖ±Êúâ298‰ΩçÊó†ÁßÅÊçêËµ†ËÄÖÔºÅÁé∞Â∑≤ÂêëÊ≠¶Ê±âÊçêËµ†Âè£ÁΩ© 6,930‰∏™ÔºåÈò≤Êä§Êúç275‰ª∂ÔºåÊä§ÁõÆÈïú200‰∏™ÔºÅÁâπÂà´ÊÑüË∞¢ËäùÂ§ßÊ†°Âèã‰ºöÔºåË•øÂåóÂ§ßÂ≠¶Ê†°Âèã‰ºöÔºåÂåóÂ§ßÊ†°Âèã‰ºöÔºåÂú£ÊØçÂ§ßÂ≠¶ÂøóÊÑøËÄÖÁ≠âÈô¢Ê†°ÁöÑÂ§ßÂäõÊîØÊåÅÔºÅ  Êàë‰ª¨‰ªçÂ∞ÜÁªßÁª≠Ë¥≠‰π∞ÂåªÁñóÁâ©ËµÑÔºåÊåÅÁª≠ÊîØÊè¥Ê≠¶Ê±âÔºåÂÖ±ÂêåÊâìËµ¢ËøôÂú∫Êàò‚ÄúÁñ´‚ÄùÔºÅ  Âú®Áñ´ÊÉÖ‰∏çÊñ≠ÂçáÁ∫ßÊúüÈó¥ÔºåÊàë‰ª¨ÂèëÁé∞ÔºöÁæéÂõΩÂåªÁñóÁâ©ËµÑÂ∑≤ÁªèÁü≠Áº∫ÔºåÈááË¥≠ÈöæÂ∫¶Âä†Â§ßÔºõÂõΩÂÜÖÂåªÁñóÁâ©ËµÑ‰æõÂ∫îÂ∑≤ÊÅ¢Â§çÔºåÂπ∂Âä†ÈÄüÁîü‰∫ßÔºõÁñ´ÊÉÖÂèëÂ±ïÁªôÂêåËÉûË∫´‰Ωì„ÄÅÂøÉÁêÜÂíåÁªèÊµé‰∏äÈÄ†ÊàêÂ§öÈáçÊâìÂáª‚Ä¶‚Ä¶  Èâ¥‰∫éÊ≠§ÔºåÊàë‰ª¨ÂêëÂπøÂ§ßÁ§æ‰ºöÂèëËµ∑Á¨¨‰∫åÈò∂ÊÆµÂãüËµÑÂÄ°ËÆÆÔºåÊâÄÊúâËµÑÈáëÂ∞ÜÁî®‰∫éÂØπÂèóÁñ´ÊÉÖ‰∏•ÈáçÂΩ±ÂìçÂú∞Âå∫ËøõË°åÂåªÁñóÁâ©ËµÑÂíåËµÑÈáëÊçêÂä©ÔºÅ  ÊÇ®ÁöÑÊîØÊåÅÂ∞ÜÂ∏ÆÂä©Ê≠¶Ê±âÂπøÂ§ß‰∏ÄÁ∫øÂåªÂä°Â∑•‰ΩúËÄÖ„ÄÅÊÇ£ËÄÖÔºõ‰πüÂ∞Ü‰øùÊä§ÊÇ®ÁöÑÂÆ∂‰π°ÔºåÊÇ®ÁöÑ‰∫≤‰∫∫ÔºåÊÇ®ÁöÑÂπøÂ§ßÂêåËÉûÔºÅ  Ê≠¶Ê±âÂä†Ê≤πÔºÅ‰∏≠ÂçéÂä†Ê≤πÔºÅ  ÂãüËµÑÁõÆÁöÑÔºöÊâÄÊúâËµÑÈáëÂ∞ÜÁî®‰∫éÂØπÂèóÁñ´ÊÉÖ‰∏•ÈáçÂΩ±ÂìçÂú∞Âå∫ËøõË°åÂåªÁñóÁâ©ËµÑÂíåËµÑÈáëÊçêÂä©  ÂèëËµ∑‰∫∫ÔºöÂçé‰∫∫‰∫§Êòì‰∏éÊäïËµÑÂçè‰ºöÔºàCTIAÔºâ  ËÅîÂêàÂèëËµ∑‰∫∫ÔºöÂ§çÊó¶Â§ßÂ≠¶ËäùÂä†Âì•Ê†°Âèã‰ºö„ÄÅËäùÂä†Âì•Âú£ÊØçÂ§ßÂ≠¶ÂøóÊÑøËÄÖ„ÄÅÂåóÂ§ßËäùÂä†Âì•Ê†°Âèã‰ºö„ÄÅËäùÂ§ßÂïÜÂ≠¶Èô¢Ê†°Âèã‰ºö„ÄÅ‰∏≠‰ºäÂà©ËØ∫‰ºäÂ∑ûÂçé‰∫∫Âçè‰ºö  Êé•Êî∂Âçï‰ΩçÔºöÁñ´ÁóÖÊïëÊ≤ªÂåªÁñóÊú∫ÊûÑ

campaigns.title: Poor Vietnam Dealing Corona Virus on Risk!
campaigns.description:
Hi ,   
 













 As you have known that corona virus widely spread out in China. And now, in Vietnam, there are cases increasingly and there having people get isolated even though we could not know how many as an exact number have died. From the countryside and uplifted areas of Vietnam, there are a lot of the poor. It is actually hard for them to survive if there aren‚Äôt enough medical supplies and food. I am afraid in the coming days the Corona virus could able to spread out. As you know that my hometown-Vietnam is one of low growth countries, they don‚Äôt have foods, medicine or even medical supply or even the hospital to secure the patient as Chinese people did. I don‚Äôt want to see my home country Vietnam will become the second center of disease outbreak in the upcoming days. It is sympathy for the death in China and it is heartbroken since I know that one day it can able happen in Vietnam in near future because my country is having lack of foods medical supplies, and many of poor in uplifted areas and countryside are facing dealing with many difficulties. 












 













  I watched videos everyday, I felt heartbroken to know in China the number of death increases everyday and can not count how many the number of people and places getting infections. I think that it would happen in Vietnam soon. I think I may do something other than just seat and watch videos. I want to do something to help other people in my hometown. I want to give hand to help others prevent this disease because I knew that they need our help. I think I have to do something other than just scowl in silence.¬†











 













  My family is Catholic, my mom and my dad told me pray for the disease everyday. Yes, of course, I do pray everyday, I pray for the health of the world. I knew praying is necessary but still not enough to prevent the epidemic from spreading and harsh, I need to do something more realistic. That is a reason why I make this fundraiser because I hope I could able to receive some fund in order to buy more foods, medicine and medical supplies for the poor people in Vietnam.   Everybody have a dream, yes, they are now dream of being cured in times of danger. China is now a center of the disease. Vietnam is close to China if Vietnam is going to be an outbreak, it will break out in the coming days. Wealthy China still has the ability to cope, and Vietnam is a slow-growing poor country, poor people will be miserable. For those people who live in the countryside, the uplifted the highland areas are the people who need to help because their life is still hungry, torn clothes, let alone plague. They do not have the means to cope with the Corona disease. They need food, medicine and medical supplies to prepare for the coming disease. 












 













  Yes, counting people in sickness in one country is tough. We can do math here, it is hard to imagine if we can count how many country have their residents involved to the sickness and from there, it spread out to other relatives and community, number would be increased. Please do math again, we can multiply them together, get any number you want. Next, for rich country they can able to secure them or have enough food and medical supply to help the patient, but with poor country, there will be more people die in silence and the virus could be able to widespread. I feel sad if I keep continue to multiple them again and again...I have thought that is there are any way to stop the spreading. I just cannot imagine which is the better way to help them, but I knew that they need our help sooner. I think the more we try stoping spread out of Corona disease sooner is the more better for everybody surround and better for also other country near by.     ¬†












 













  Last but not least, I hope I can have your helping hand. I will use all this donation for the charity - getting more foodstuffs and medical supply for the poor in Vietnam. I am appreciated for any help that you could make. Please save the poor Vietnam on preventing the Corona Virus. We need your help in the near future. Please¬†save  Vietnam on preventing the Corona diseases. God bless you, Amen!


 https://www.change.org/p/united-nations-call-for-the-resignation-of-tedros-adhanom-ghebreyesus-who-director-general?recruiter=1043450372 utm_source=share_petition utm_medium=sms utm_campaign=psf_combo_share_initial recruited_by_id=f47da0b0-51d1-11ea-a544-938f2b557b3e 




! 












 













   
 













 ¬†












 













 ¬†

campaigns.title: Medical Assistance for Corona Virus
campaigns.description: My name is Philip Matthew O'Malley. I have had a tough life and have not taken the easy road. Unfortunately, I have had a tough time securing full time work in the last few years due to discrimination in the workplace and customer inertia.  Over the last days I have developed flu like symptoms which have gotten very worse. I've been short of breath and struggle to breath. All indications lead me to think this is the #CoronaVirus and I, Philip O'Malley have contracted it!  I have a lot of underlying conditions such as Sleep Apnea and I've also had cancer twice previously. As I live off the dole, I am unable to afford private health insurance. With all indications pointing towards health struggle in the future, I'd love some peace of mind with insurance!¬†  Social Media:  Twitter:   https://twitter.com/PhilipOMalley6   PeriScope:   https://www.pscp.tv/SligoPhilip/   YouTube:   https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=UUJYv0YZANSMf5FZGMxaI4ug   Facebook:   https://www.facebook.com/philip.omalley.90    Relevant News:  Sligo man's LinkedIn video goes viral thanks to the kindness of strangers:   https://www.joe.ie/life-style/sligo-man-linkedin-viral-616359    'Better than Tinder' - How people, young and old, are finding love in rural Ireland:   https://www.independent.ie/business/farming/rural-life/better-than-tinder-how-people-young-and-old-are-finding-love-in-rural-ireland-36080701.html    Sligo man‚Äôs video asking the ‚Äúbusiness community for employment‚Äù goes viral and gets huge response from employers:   https://theliberal.ie/video-sligo-mans-video-asking-the-business-community-for-employment-goes-viral-and-gets-huge-response-from-employers/    MY 8-HOUR DAY   THAT'S JUST COMMUTING TO WORK:   https://www.thefreelibrary.com/MY+8-HOUR+DAY+%26+THAT%27S+JUST+COMMUTING+TO+WORK.-a0171084479     Every little bit helps.

campaigns.title: CORONA VIRUS HELP SERVICE
campaigns.description: Corona Virus is the most deadliest virus at the moment   with the help of World Health Organization ( WHO) and other Organizations we have decided to raise some funds among ourselves and the entire public that see it fit to assist those already infected and under surveillance.  We would really appreciate all the help that can be given to these specific people with the virus, this is the only way to help in eradicating and sponsoring medical department for more research to be done. The fund would be needed as urgent has possible because the virus keep spreading everywhere   the earlier more medical team are sponsored the faster a vaccine can be found.  We the entire health team with support from various organization would really appreciate all financial support donation that can be provided as soon as possible .

campaigns.title: Get Mr.Tran anti coronavirus medicine
campaigns.description: kevin needs medicine for anti corona virus

campaigns.title: Fight Against The Coronavirus
campaigns.description: Jaime and I have lived in Hong Kong for 15 years and the experiences this city provides, shapes us into the people we are today. Its given us the opportunity to build great personal and professional relationships.¬† It is our home and the people of Hong Kong are our community.¬†  The coronavirus has spread to HK and the exact course it will take is unknown. Currently, the focus of many HK citizens is prevention and the ability to take care of themselves and their family. There has been a run on basic supplies, lack of supplies and retailers who take advantage by price gauging. Some call this survival instincts, hysteria and others think it's fueled my rumors. Either way, the reality is people gain peace of mind when they have reserves of necessities and others simply do not have the means to procure them.  My family and I were able to leave HK before the virus spread and receive daily requests to send supplies from the US back. Many of the requests come from work colleagues, other factory owners and my own China workers/team.  The main requests are:  Face Masks - basic surgical and N95¬† Hand Sanitizer Antibacterial Wipes - for hands and home Lysol Disinfectant Spray¬† Toilet Paper¬†  We purchased a lot of supplies ourselves but ask our friends and community to help in our ability to do more. We hope through fund raising we can purchase larger quantities and more frequently ship items back by Fedex (USPS suspended shipping to HK/China).  None of the items purchased through fund raising will be put to personal use. We will disseminate the products to the families of our factory workers , local cleaners, the elderly (drop off at local elderly homes and centers) and charities who help those with limited financial means.  We truly appreciate all the support, concern and love.

campaigns.title: In the pursuit of science!
campaigns.description: As we‚Äôve all heard, the new coronavirus has swept through China and is slowly creeping into the rest of the world. Currently there has been a lot of speculation on whether or not the virus can be spread during its incubation period. Or through Individuals who show no symptoms. If this page raises 100,000 dollars I will contact the CDC on and offer myself as a Guinea Pig. To be locked in a room with either confirmed cases with no symptoms, or confirmed cases that are too early to show symptoms. If it‚Äôs proved that neither Asymptomatic nor incubating individuals are transmitting it. Then I will allow them to test the distance the virus travels in aerosols or how long droplets can live on a surface. My only real rule would be that the tests be done in a western country (preferably the United States) and atleast 20% of the staff speak English so I understand what‚Äôs going on.

campaigns.title: Medical Supplies for Corona Virus Prevention
campaigns.description:
My hometown Wuhan is deeply affected by the coronavirus outbreak and my family members, as healthcare professionals, are working in Tongji hospital, one of the major hospitals in the province helping with the infected patients. As of now, the death toll from the coronavirus rose to roughly 1,360, and the total confirmed cases worldwide surpassed 60,000.
 

 Tongji hospital is currently in great need of medical supplies, including n95 masks, surgical masks, safety goggles, surgical gloves etc. All medical personnel will be starting to work full-time in the following weeks and all masks need to be changed every 4 hours to ensure their effectiveness. Therefore, with your donation of a small amount could prevent people from being endangered by the virus.¬†  As the supplies have run out in stores, we are fortunate to collaborate with Tzu Chi Medical Foundation located in Alhambra, CA to get the medical supplies and donate them directly to the Tongji hospital in Wuhan.  Again, your contribution is greatly greatly appreciated! Please email me at  linadu628@gmail.com ¬†should you have any questions.¬†

campaigns.title: Sending Medical Supplies to Defeat COVID-19
campaigns.description: Coronavirus (COVID-19) is a growing global threat.  [Photo above shows the latest global picture of the spread of the COVID-19 (coronavirus) as of February 10, 2020 ]   Many hospitals in regions of China are experiencing a shortage of medical protective supplies, putting medical workers at risk and possibly contributing to the spread of the infection.  The students of the International Public Policy and Management (IPPAM) Program at the USC Price School of Public Policy seek to galvanize public support to assist medical workers in China, who are on the frontlines in caring for patients.¬† Quick action now can have an impact on assisting hospitals and medical providers in China.  We have been in contact with the Shanghai and Jiangsu Center of Disease Control, who have provided a list of medical supplies (surgical masks, N95 and protective suits) needed by hospitals in their jurisdictions and who have agreed to distribute supplies sent to them.¬† We have also contacted manufacturers of supplies such as surgical masks in a number of countries who can ramp up production to increase the shipment of supplies to China.¬† We have contacted international and local logistics companies to help in the transport of the supplies.  We are launching a fundraising campaign on Go Fund Me.¬† The funds will be used to facilitate the purchase and transport of medical protective supplies that will be distributed to hospitals in China.¬†  As global citizens, we recognize that epidemics, natural disasters and strife can strike anywhere. We believe that those outside of the crisis zone should come to the aid of those in need. We are part of an educational program that has many students and alumni from China. This is a time when we can let them know that we stand with them as they work to contain the epidemic. We hope that you will join us. Time is of the essence.¬† Please give what you can.  You will be able to track our efforts on the Go Fund Me page and on our social media sites.   We are in discussion with an NGO to jointly launch this campaign in order to have tax dedectible for every donor, which will take some time. As soon as we add this NGO in, we will let everyone know this good new.

campaigns.title: Fundraising for Coronavirus for Chinese hospitals
campaigns.description: This fundraising is created for the Coronavirus in China.¬† It has already infected thousands of people in multiple cities. So far 24000 people have been infected and 490 people have been killed from the virus and many cities are quarantining their citizens to try and prevent the spread.¬†                       We are fundraising in hopes to send masks and other medical supplies, which are very much needed, to the Wuhan hospital where the virus originated.¬† Your donation will help purchase medical supplies and ship them to Wuhan and other affected cities for those who need it.

campaigns.title: Coronavirus Dancing Victims
campaigns.description: The recent Coronavirus crisis has touched on every aspect of our lives and livelihoods. ¬†And, this epidemic has severely affected our beloved dance world. ¬†From the cancellation of three major Asian Open competitions, to the lockdown of an entire city, and to the many travel restrictions in and out of Asia that has been set in place our world, and especially our dance world, has been severely impacted.  In the meantime, one can only imagine how difficult it must be for some dancers in the Far East to dance, find work, and even continue to survive in the current conditions. ¬†Some of them have lost all their work and income completely. ¬†Studios are being closed down. ¬†They are struggling to not only earn enough money but to even just stay healthy as some are even fighting the deadly virus. ¬†These people, these dancers, are our colleagues, students, and friends. ¬†They are suffering and struggling to survive!  We, at the WDC Competitors Commission as well as the WDC and WDCAL, would like to ensure that we do everything we can to help our fellow colleagues and dancers in the Far East. ¬†We would have set up this GoFundMe page to help our fellow dancers in the Far East and we want to encourage our friends, patrons, vendors, suppliers, and colleagues from around the world to pull together and help one another in overcoming this crisis. ¬†We are asking everyone to extend your hand and support for our fellow dancers. ¬†Your donation will be a great help for the dancers that have been affected the most by this deadly virus in the epidemic city of Wuhan and other neighboring affected cities in the Hubei Province. ¬†  Your donations will be greatly appreciated and all donations will go to the NDC of China, a member organization of the World Dance Council, for distribution to those dancers that need it the most. ¬†Any donation will go a long way for those greatly affected by this terrible virus! We at the WDC CC would like to thank you for your time, consideration, and support for your fellow dancer!  The Management Committee of the WDC Competitors Commission

campaigns.title: Win the Battle with Coronavirus in Wuhan Together
campaigns.description: The coronavirus (COVID-19) affecting Wuhan, China is a critical global health issue.  Chinese health officials reported on 2/5/2020 that there had been 563 deaths from the outbreak and 28018 cases of the coronavirus. Tons of medical workers are still struggle on the front line , the day and night.¬†  Although China is a well-resourced country and is already receiving generous donations of supplies and money to combat the virus, there is still an urgent need for additional medical supplies such as N95 masks (3M: 1870,8210), surgical masks (3M: 1860, 9132), Isolation Gowns (Tyvek : 1422A, 800TJ;¬† 3M 4565, 4545), and Protective Eyewear (3M 1623/1621AF).  The funding will cover both the purchase and shipment of high-quality medical supplies directly to Wuhan.  By providing Wuhan ¬†with supplies to prevent this virus from spreading further, we promote our own health and safety here in the United States. ¬†  Let's put our strength together to win the war against the coronavirus ! With God's help, we can do it! God bless China! God bless the United States!   ¬† ¬† ¬† ¬† ¬† ¬† ¬† ¬† ¬† ¬† ¬† ¬† ¬† ¬† ¬† ¬† ¬† ¬† ¬† ¬†¬† Thank you for your support and kindness!  ** *** Please note that this campaign is for pure donations only. Donors will NOT receive anything in return for their donations.

Im Interesse eines jeden ist es, dass er kurz und knapp informiert wird, wie weit das Virus sich verbreitet hat, welche Schutzma√ünahmen entsprechend der fortschreitenden Entwicklung er ergreifen sollte und wie er sich am besten verh√§lt, wenn er mit Infizierten in Kontakt kommt oder selbst erkrankt. campaigns.title: ICBCers Combat Novel Corona Virus
campaigns.description: Novel Coronavirus(2019-nCoV) is a new respiratory virus first identified in Wuhan, a big transportation hub in China. The virus is highly contagious and it's appearance during the peak of Chinese New Year has allowed it to spread to other cities. It has now passed SARS in deaths, and is several times more infectious in its spread.   As of February 13, 2020, according to the government's report in China, 63,851 people have been diagnosed with coronavirus, 10,109 people are suspected of being infected and 1,380 people have died.  These numbers increase every day, it is threatening the lives of hundreds of millions not only in China, but around the world.   China estimates that the peak of the infection rate will be around mid-February, the most difficult time has yet to come. In all Chinese cities, schools are delayed and all public facilities are shut down. Due to the unexpected outbreak, hundreds of millions of Chinese people's lives are at stake.   Items such as: masks, goggles and protective suits which are used to combat the spread of this disease are high in demand but low in supply. We need your help to fight against this devastating illness.¬†  We appeal to all people with kindness, please participate in our crowdfunding!  Gathering sand into a tower, love is boundless! Together we work together!¬†  We firmly believe that with your help, we will definitely win this fight against the disease! campaigns.title: Help fight the COVID-19  epidemic in Mongolia!
campaigns.description: Hi, I'm Fox, an American adventurer and explorer. Several years ago, I visited Mongolia, known as the land of the eternal blue sky, and fell in love with its people. Today, Mongolia is¬† battling the COVID-19 (Wuhan coronavirus) epidemic and struggling with a severe shortage of medical masks. Medical masks are critical to protect against COVID-19 infection. My mission is to purchase as many medical masks in America as I possibly can, and take them to Mongolia, where I will personally distribute them to the Mongolian people. Special priority will be given to women and children. I am determined to accomplish my mission or die trying. Please donate today and share my campaign with your friends. Your donation will save lives and bring you good karma! :-)

campaigns.title: Help Fight the Coronavirus!
campaigns.description: The current NCP (Novel coronavirus pneumonia) epidemic in China has caused tens of thousands of infections. As of February 11th, there were 42,715 confirmed infections and 1,017 deaths, and number of confirmed and suspected cases has increased by more than 5,000 every day. Wuhan is the largest outbreak area in China, however, the total geographic area affected by the virus encompasses approximately 70% of the county at present. And the number of infected people in various provinces across China is increasing.   ¬†  Since the outbreak of pneumonia (which is caused by the coronavirus), Shenyang City, as the center of Liaoning Province, is implementing a centralized treatment program for patients with corona virus-related pneumonia in Shenyang and 7 surrounding cities. And the Chinese government also remains at the forefront of efforts to contain the current epidemic prevention, as well. Together with the medical community (hospitals and physicians) and Chinese citizens, the government of China is aggressively working to curb the spread of the virus and protect everyone‚Äôs health. Everyone should continue to work together to help eradicate this public health threat. ¬†  The medical community is also taking steps to maximize the supply of available protective clothing and sanitary masks; however, demand for these items currently exceeds available supply. In order to improve prevention and control of the epidemic, several key hospitals in Liaoning Province have put forth proposals to all sectors of the society, asking for domestic and international assistance by donating urgently needed protective garments and masks to Liaoning Province.   As a Liaoning native living here in the United States, Mr. Ming Li has been working to help provide protective medical garments and masks for the people in his hometown, as well as for medical staff members. Thanks to everyone‚Äôs assistance, the first batch of N95 protective masks and medical protective clothing are already on their way to China.   Primary protective healthcare materials include:   ¬∑¬†¬†¬†¬†¬†¬†¬†¬† N95 mask (International Standard: ISO22609:2005, American Standard: NIOSH, N95/N99 + Fluid resistant, European Standard: EN14683-2005, Chinese Standard: GB19083-2010)  ¬∑¬†¬†¬†¬†¬†¬†¬†¬† Protective Eyewear (elastic wear (compatible with myopia), wide field of vision, splash-proof function, without ventilations, such as: 3M 1623AF)  ¬∑¬†¬†¬†¬†¬†¬†¬†¬† Protective Clothing (International Standard: ISO22609:2004, American Standard: ASTMF1671-A, SH 42 CFR84; ANSI/AAMI, EU Standard: EN14126, Chinese Standard: GB 19082) ¬† We continue to need donations to provide desperately needed medical supplies to all affected areas in China.¬† All donations will strictly be used to purchase medical supplies and provide shipping costs for sending to key hospitals in Liaoning Province, such as:  ¬∑¬†¬†¬†¬†¬†¬†¬†¬† The Sixth People‚Äôs Hospital of Shenyang (Liaoning Infectious Disease Hospital)  ¬∑¬†¬†¬†¬†¬†¬†¬†¬† The First Affiliated Hospital of China Medical University  ¬∑¬†¬†¬†¬†¬†¬†¬†¬† Shengjing Hospital Affiliated to China Medical University ¬† Please help us with your generous donations and we‚Äòll continue to do our best to provide the assistance needed to help everyone who has been affected by this event. With your support and best wishes, more of those in need will be treated!   Thank you for your support!   Co-Organizers:   Ming LiÔºåUSEWARE.INC CEO  Alana ZhangÔºåUSEWARE., INC   White YangÔºåShenYang Xixin Technology Co., Ltd.¬† Marketing Manager  ¬† Tracking information: Liaoning sent more than a thousand medical staff to Hubei to fight the epidemic   An epidemic is currently raging in China! Under the strong leadership of the Liaoning Provincial Party Committee and the Provincial Government, and in accordance with the decision of the provincial epidemic prevention and control headquarters, Liaoning Province supports the Hubei Medical Team, the Disease Control Team, the critically ill medical team, and the Liaoning National Emergency Team. The Medical Rescue Team successfully went to Hubei to fight the epidemic on the ground. From January 26th to the evening of February 9th, Liaoning Province has sent a total of 6 medical teams and a CDC team with a total of 7 doctors, a total of 1382 people have assisted Hubei and assisted Wuhan, Xianning and other places to carry out the new crown pneumonia epidemic prevention and control.  ¬† It‚Äôs understood that after arriving in Hubei, most of the medical staff of the Liaoning Medical Team will enter the Lei Shenshan Hospital to work with medical staff at the Wuhan University Zhongnan Hospital and other institutions to fight the new coronavirus pneumonia epidemic. ¬†  The value of your donations is powerful and desperately needed.   For example: your $100 pledge purchases N95 type protection masks with varying levels of effectiveness, based on specific use.  A $100 donation will allow us to supply the following valuable protective material:   ¬∑¬†¬†¬†¬†¬†¬†¬†¬† Five 3M 1860 Medical Masks (4-hour effectiveness time rating)  ¬∑¬†¬†¬†¬†¬†¬†¬†¬† Thirty 3M 8210 Standard N95 masks (4-hour effectiveness time rating)  Healthcare providers wearing these masks protect them from being exposed to the virus while providing help to those who are infected, which is critical for success in overcoming this health crisis!  ¬† ¬∑¬†¬†¬†¬†¬†¬†¬†¬† For any donations, you‚Äôll receive a poster pin or background screen saver about supporting the Wuhan Virus Relief Campaign.  ¬∑¬†¬†¬†¬†¬†¬†¬†¬† For donations over $100, you‚Äôll receive USB flash drive with ‚ÄúWuhan Jiayou‚Äù inscribed.  ¬∑¬†¬†¬†¬†¬†¬†¬†¬† For donations over $200, you‚Äôll receive a ‚ÄúWuhan Jiayou‚Äù T-Shirt.  Able Software is offering to help provide badly needed medical supplies to the affected areas in China.  The Able Software cooperative corporate donation program allows our valued customers an opportunity to generously donate to the Wuhan Virus Relief Effort campaign. Able Software will gladly provide complimentary Utility Star technical services free of charge to our customers who wish to make a corporate donation. ¬† Please note: all pictures provided are from taken from internet content. If there is any infringement issue, please inform us as soon as possible so we can remove the content.

campaigns.title: Helping with Coronavirus in China
campaigns.description:
Current situation: The  coronavirus  (SARS-Cov-2) is spreading, which as of today 14th Feb 2020 has infected  56951  people in China and  57396  people around the world in total. Wuhan, where the outbreak started, has 34289 people infected, and has been quarantined for 22 days.  Medical¬†supplies such as protective clothing are in shortage  and hospital workers are contacting the virus, especially as the gear needs to be changed.¬† If you would like to find out more: [  https://www.cnn.com/2020/02/13/asia/coronavirus-health-care-workers-infected-intl-hnk/index.html  ]  What we think: Even in this overwhelming situation, we are still trying to contribute what we can as ordinary people. My friends and I have been wanting to do something, to protect the people that are fighting the virus in the hospital, and to protect individual from getting infected. For those who may not know, the Red Cross has been notoriously unreliable for getting supplies hospitals in the current crisis, and we want to act directly. [  https://www.cnn.com/2020/02/06/asia/red-cross-china-donations-intl-hnk/index.html ] ¬†  What we are going to do: We are in contact with  a Chinese manufacturer of protective clothing , to purchase more supplies to send to  Tianyou Hospital in Wuhan .  Tianyou Hospital is a designated hospital for coronavirus. (We have contacted the hospital and confirmed that they are in shortage of the protective clothing we could provide).   While unfortunately we  have not been able to find protective suits that would meet the highest requirements for use by ICU staff ,  these suits will go to protect other hospital workers who is facing the risk . Those suits meet  the specification of GB19082-2009 (Chinese official standard), and manufacturer‚Äôs qualification has been verified by the receiving hospital.¬† My friends and I will be donating 200 suits, and I would like to invite anyone else who would like to contribute to donating more units.  As¬† we hope to contribute as soon as possible,  we aim to place the order with however much we can raise by the end of today .¬†
 

 current and future situation will be updated here:   https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/11Jkkc0ksYspk4iqxgPKpdrMjdQt-qKCW01ePJwkoYXo

campaigns.title: Help corona virus evacuees get home!
campaigns.description:
My name is Lisa Peecher from Perris California, and I am creating this campaign to raise money on behalf of my son Tyler Shepherd. This campaign donations will be spent by Tyler shepherd to provide food, water, diapers, and traveling expenses for him and his family. I intend on making him the beneficiary where he will be able to withdraw the funds on his own behalf 


 Tyler Shepherd, his wife and 1 year old son have been on lockdown for 16 days in Wuhan, Hubei Province, China despite having no symptoms related to the coronavirus.¬†  The American embassy finally allowed them to travel back to America on a cargo aircraft to be with their family, but they will be billed $1000 each for this flight to the US. Which is why we have raised our goal from $2000 to $3500. They are being flown to Omaha, Nebraska where they will be quarantined for 14 days to ensure they are negative for the coronavirus.


 



 They have to pay for this with no financial help from the government which is why we are seeking help for them. ¬†After being quarantined they will have to travel to California to be reunited with their family. This money will help them buy food, diapers, water, and necessities after their quarantine is over and they can return to their jobs.


 
When they finally arrive I will give them the donations and they will be very happy for all the support 



 Any donations would mean the world to us. Thank you and god bless!

campaigns.title: Coronavirus Medical Supplies In Need
campaigns.description: My hometown Wuhan is deeply affected by the coronavirus outbreak and my family members, as healthcare professionals, are working in Tongji hospital, one of the major hospitals in the province helping with the infected patients. As of now, the death toll from the coronavirus rose to roughly 1,360, and the total confirmed cases worldwide surpassed 60,000.  Tongji hospital is currently in great need of medical supplies, including n95 masks, surgical masks, safety goggles, surgical gloves, etc. All medical personnel will start working full-time in the following weeks and all masks need to be changed every 4 hours to ensure their effectiveness. Therefore, your donation of a small amount could prevent people from being endangered by the virus.¬†  As the supplies have run out in stores, we are fortunate to collaborate with Tzu Chi Medical Foundation located in Alhambra, CA to get the medical supplies and donate them directly to the Tongji hospital in Wuhan.  Again, your contribution is greatly greatly appreciated!
