campaigns.title: Fight Coronavirus (CoVID-19)! Support Wuhan!
campaigns.description: Please join Where Music Carries Us Inc. in making a difference in our global community. WMCU is raising money to benefit those who are affected by the Wuhan coronavirus. All donations will go towards medical supplies and other necessities in Wuhan, China. Thank you in advance for your contribution to this cause.  All donations are tax-deductible and we provide receipts with our tax ID. All proceeds will go directly to the Wuhan University New York Alumni Association for the purchase and shipment of medical supplies to Wuhan and other infected areas in China.  To ¬†learn more about the coronavirus outbreak, visit  https://www.who.int/emergencies/diseases/novel-coronavirus-2019 ¬†  More information about Where Music Carries Us Inc. Visit WhereMusicCarriesUs.org WMCU is a nonprofit organization based in Princeton, NJ. We spread the joy of music in order to best serve our community with our passions and we seek to promote awareness and youth action. We welcome you to join us in our mission.

campaigns.title: Scooter Veterinary Help!
campaigns.description: Hello I really could use a little help withy pup Scooter. As you all know I do not have any children, so Scooter is the closest thing o have to a child. Scooter has a hematoma in his right ear. And none of the vets are willing to work out a payment program to help me get the proper care for my animal. Any little bit will help. I would fall apart is something happened to hi.

campaigns.title: Stop and prevent the corona virus
campaigns.description: THE TIME TO ACT IS NOW! YOU HOLD THE KEY TO PUTTING THE BRAKES ON THE CORONAVIRUS EPIDEMIC The Coronavirus is an epidemic that currently defies containment! Health authorities have been struggling to contain its spread ever since its discovery. Yet, the virus has now been declared a ‚ÄòPublic Health Emergency of International Concern‚Äô by the World Health Organization.  ¬†75,775 cases have been confirmed as of 20 February 2019, affecting every Chinese province and more than two dozen additional countries. 11,795 of these cases are serious and 2,130 individuals have died. There are travel restrictions in place, and signs of economic instability loom on the horizon. While scientists work frantically to develop a vaccine, the numbers of those afflicted continue to rise. Handwashing and distributing n95 masks seem to be the only way to deter its spread. But it‚Äôs not a perfect solution, and keeping up with the demand for masks is daunting. My name is (mark v). I have launched this campaign to raise funds to quickly produce over one million n95 masks to distribute to children and hospitals before the current supply runs out. I have a production goal of 200,000 masks daily and am confident that I can reach this goal with your help! I am currently seeking $250,000 to order a production machine and two containers of materials to initiate production before it‚Äôs too late! ¬†Reaching this goal will also entail building a factory capable of mass production. I have identified Vietnam as the most logical place to launch this project because of its proximity to China and its robust labor force. ¬†My plan is to then quickly apply new technology, such as incorporating copper into the masks‚Äô construction and/or a sodium chloride salt coating to destroy the pathogens. These two improvements will make n95 masks 100% effective. As an entrepreneur, my visionary thinking and problem-solving skills have prepared me for success. I will personally fly to Vietnam to hire the right people and oversee the factory‚Äôs operations 24/7. But the generosity of donors is the real key to making my project a reality. Your donation will ensure that children and hospitals will have a supply of n95 masks when and where they need it when supplies begin to dwindle! In addition to your support, please forward this campaign to your friends, family members, colleagues and social media contacts. Power rests in numbers ‚Äì this is your chance to make a difference! With heartfelt appreciation, (Mark v)

campaigns.title: Fight Against Corona Virus
campaigns.description: We have the money... we have the technology... but it will still take 18 months to find the vaccine for corona virus?!?! I am raising an awareness, what awareness? We have the money, and the resources to fight against this. What's the best way to do it? The best way is to get the top 1% involved. They have the capitals, the connections, and the motivations. Corona doesn't discriminate, it doesn't matter if you're white, black, Asian, or rich.   ¬† ¬† ¬† ¬† ¬† ¬† ¬† ¬† 10 millions is nothing to top 1%. But if it gets their attention, then maybe we can shorten the vaccine development time by half, or even a third. Which can save lives. I'll start my donation of $100. Lets save some lives people!!!!

campaigns.title: Corona Virus Assistance Program
campaigns.description: I'm raising money in aid of corona virus Relief And Development Agency and every donation will help. The funds raised will help those who are affected with the virus to get assistance for treatment. Thank you God bless.

campaigns.title: Abschluss der Studie in der Zeit des Coronavirus
campaigns.description: Rom, 19/02/2020  Liebe Freunde,  ¬†  ich hei√üe Sophia Lilin Wu. Ich bin eine chinesische Laiin und Theologie-Studentin im zweiten Jahr vom ersten Studienzyklus an der P√§pstliche Gregoriana Universit√§t. Wie Sie wissen, erleidet China, besonders Wuhan, das Coronavirus seit Anfang des neuen Jahres 2020. Da dieses Virus so resistent ist, hat es sich auch bald ausgebreitet in anderen Teilen Chinas und der Welt.  Mein Herz bricht wenn ich so viel t√§gliches Leid anschauen muss. Um das chinesische Volk helfen zu k√∂nnen das Coronavirus zu bek√§mpfen und insbesondere um meine Verwandten zu helfen, die in der Shandong-Provinz wohnen, habe ich fast 700 Mundmasken gekauft und nach China gesandt (Shandong und Beijing). Einer meiner Freunde in Beijing sagte mir dass sogar die √Ñrzte und Krankenschwestern in den Spit√§lern heutzutage keine Masken finden k√∂nnen, um √ºber andere Leute gar nicht zu reden. Darum habe ich versucht Ihnen zu helfen. Ohne Maske kann man ja nirgendswo hingehen wegen den gro√üen Gesundheitsrisiken. Untersucher haben jetzt herausgefunden dass es sogar √ºber die Luft √ºbertragbar ist in nur zwei Sekunden.   Sie brauchen dringend gen√ºgend Masken um ein Grundschutz zu haben. Ich bin einziges Kind. Von meiner j√ºngsten Kindheit ab, haben meiner Vater und meine Mutter ihr Bestes gegeben um mir mit den besten Sorgen zu umgeben, in der besten Schule zu erziehen, mich zu ermutigen an der beste Universit√§t Chinas zu promovieren als Doktor in Philosophie, meine Studien der katholischen Theologie in Rom zu unterst√ºtzen ‚Äì obwohl sie selber gar nicht christlich sind. Ihre echte und tiefe Liebe ist was ihr dazu gebracht mich in all meine Entscheidungen zu unterst√ºtzen. Liebe braucht Gegenliebe. Deswegen entschied ich mich dazu ihnen die beste √§rztliche Hilfsmittel zu geben. Vom 25. Januar, das chinesische Neujahr, bis heute habe ich fast jeden Tag ausgeschaut nach Masken um nach China zu schicken. Bis heute sind schon 700 Masken nach China gegangen. Schwierig ist aber dass die normale Transportwege nach China nicht mehr funktionieren, nur DHL konnte mir helfen diese Masken zu transportieren. Aber das billigste und kleinste DHL-Paket kostet schon 58 Euro. Um eine fixe Pr√§senz von Masken in China zu garantieren, musste ich oft Pakete schicken ‚Äì in dieser Monat habe ich fast 500 Euro f√ºr Transport zahlen m√ºssen. Und wegen der gro√üe Nachfrage, steigern sich die Preise der Masken. Zum Beispiel: eine FFP2-Maske kostete 5 Euro, heute aber schon 10 Euro. Eine FFP3-Maske kostete vorher 7 Euro, jetzt 15 bis 20 Euro. Sie k√∂nnen aber nur 8 Stunden verwendet werden. Obwohl manche Freunde mir geholfen haben, habe ich nach eine Monat kein Geld mehr auf mein Bankkonto. I erinnere mich am Abend des 17. Februar, den ersten Tag des zweiten Semester, wenn die Apotheke mir anrief mit der Mitteilung dass sie mehr FFP2-Masken gefunden h√§tten. Mit mein Geld konnte ich aber nur noch 29 Masken kaufen. Dieses Geld war mir in September von meiner Mutter gegeben f√ºr mein Lebensunterhalt und Studium in Rom. Se meinte immer dass ich etwas brauche f√ºr Notf√§lle, z.B. um Medizinen zu kaufen wenn ich krank w√§re oder ein Ticket nach Hause kaufen zu k√∂nnen. Jetzt hat sich aber all dieses Geld in Masken verwandelt. Fr√ºher konnte ich mich immer auf meine Eltern berufen wenn ich in Not war. Jetzt aber steht China still. Ich wei√ü gar nicht ob mein Vater noch ein Gehalt bekommt. Darum entschloss ich mich dass ich diesmal ihnen helfen musste. Liebe Freunde, hilf mir bitte um mein Leben und Studium in Rom weitersetzen zu k√∂nnen. Es fehlt nur anderthalb Jahr um meinem ersten Zyklus der Theologie zu beenden an der Gregoriana Universit√§t. Ich habe eine Studienb√∂rse die mir ein Unterkommen und Essen gibt, brauche aber etwas Geld f√ºr die n√§chste sieben Monate (bis September): f√ºr Scans, Kopien, f√ºr die Vorbereitung von Anfragen f√ºr eine neue Studienb√∂rse und um Tickets von und nach Krakau zahlen zu k√∂nnen im Sommer. Ich tr√§ume n√§mlich nach meine Studien in Polen zu leben und zu arbeiten, darum habe ich schon ein Aufenthalt in Polen geplant im Sommer, um Polnisch zu studieren. Die Studienb√∂rse f√ºr das Polnisch-Unterricht deckt aber keine Transportkosten.  Der Glauben an die Sch√∂nheit der Menschenherzen treibt mich an dieser Brief zu schreiben. Wie das Lied der Olympischen Spiele in Beijing 2008 es ausdruckte: du und ich, Herz zu Herz, wir sind Familie.  Ich danke Ihnen von ganzem Herzen und glaube dass Gott ihre G√ºte vergelten wird!  ¬†  ¬†  ¬†  ¬†  ¬†  ¬†  ¬†  ¬†

campaigns.title: Pour terminer l'√©tude √† l'√©poque du coronavirus
campaigns.description: Rome, 19/02/2020  Chers amis,  ¬†  Je m'appelle Sophia Lilin Wu. Je suis une √©tudiante de th√©ologie chinoise, maintenant dans la deuxi√®me ann√©e du premier cycle √† l'Universit√© Pontificale Gr√©gorienne. Comme vous savez bien, la Chine, en particulier Wuhan, souffre du virus corona d√®s le d√©but de 2020. Vu qu'il est tr√®s r√©sistent, ce virus se r√©pands bien vite dans d'autres parties de la Chine et du monde.  Face √† cette d√©tresse mon c≈ìur se rompt. Pour aider le peuple chinois √† combattre ce virus et en particulier pour aider ma famille qui habite dans la province de Shandong, j'ai achet√© presque 700 masques et je les ai envoy√©s √† Shandong et √† P√©kin. Un ami √† P√©kin m'a racont√© qu'entretemps m√™me les m√©decins et les infirmi√®res dans les h√¥pitaux ne trouvent plus de masques, pour ne pas parler des autres. C'est la raison pour laquelle je cherche de faire mon mieux pour leur donner un coup de main. En effet, on ne peut pas bouger sans masque √† cause des grandes risques de contamination. Les chercheurs ont entretemps retrouv√© que le virus se r√©pande m√™me dans l'air dans seulement deux secondes.  Tout de suite ils ont besoin d'assez de masques pour garantir une protection minimale. Je suis enfant unique. De ma premi√®re enfance jusqu'√† maintenant mon p√®re et ma m√®re ont fait leur mieux pour me donner tout dont j'avais besoin: une √©ducation dans la meilleure √©cole, l'encouragement √† obtenir un doctorat en philosophie √† la meilleure universit√© de Chine (l'Universit√© de P√©kin), le soutien √† √©tudier la th√©ologie catholique √† Rome (bien qu'ils ne sont pas chr√©tiens).C'est leur amour r√©el et fort qui les a pouss√©s √† me soutenir toujours. Amour redemande amour. Ainsi je me suis d√©cid√© de leur donner les meilleures aides m√©dicales. Du 25 janvier, la nouvelle ann√©e chinoise, jusqu‚Äôaujourd'hui j'ai cherch√© des masques √† envoyer en Chine. Entretemps 7000 masques sont en train d'y partir. Mais ‚Ä¶ les cargos normaux ne partent plus pour la Chine, seulement DHL pourrait m'aider. Leur paquet le plus petit et le plus √©conomique coute n√©anmoins 58 euros. Pour garantir un r√©serve de masques en Chine je dois leur envoyer tr√®s souvent des paquets. Ce mois-ci ca m‚Äôa cout√© presque 500 euros. A cause du besoin le prix des masques augmente beaucoup. Auparavant un masque ne FFP2 co√ªtait que 5 euros, maintenant on a besoin de 10 euros. Un masque FFP3 co√ªtait 7 euros, maintenant 15 √† 20 euros. Et √ßa ne peut √™tre utilis√© que durant 8 heures. Bien que certains amis ont contribu√©, apr√®s un mois je n'ai plus d'argent sur mon compte bancaire. Je me souviens le soir du 17 f√©vrier quand la pharmacie m'appelait parce qu'ils avaient trouv√© d'autres masques FFP2. Mais avec ma carte bancaire je ne pouvais plus acheter que 29 masques. Cet argent, qui n'y est plus, m'avait √©t√© donn√© par ma m√®re en septembre pour financier ma vie et mes √©tudes √† Rome. Ma maman voulait que j'aurais toujours les moyens de m'acheter des m√©decins si je tomberais malade ou de me procurer un ticket pour tourner chez moi. Maintenant tout cet argent-l√† s'est transform√© en masques. Auparavant je pourrais toujours me tourner vers mes parents si j'√©tais dans le besoin. Maintenant la Chine s'est bloqu√©e. Je ne sais m√™me pas si mon p√®re re√ßoit encore un salaire. Ainsi je me suis d√©cid√© de les aider moi-m√™me, cette fois-ci. Donc, chers amis, je vous demande de m'aider √† continuer ma vie et mes √©tudes √† Rome. Ainsi je pourrais finir mon premier cycle de th√©ologie √† l‚ÄôUniversit√© Gr√©gorienne. J‚Äôai une bourse d‚Äô√©tudes qui me procure aussi l‚Äôh√©bergement et de la nourriture. C‚Äôest donc seulement une petite aide que je vous demande pour ces sept mois (de maintenant jusqu‚Äô√† septembre)¬†: j‚Äôai besoin d‚Äôun petit peu d‚Äôargent pour faire des scans et photocopies, pour pr√©parer les applications pour une nouvelle bourse d‚Äô√©tudes et pour les tickets de voyage en √©t√© entre Rome et Cracovie. Je songe d‚Äôaller vivre et travailler en Pologne apr√®s mes √©tudes, donc durant l‚Äô√©t√© j‚Äôai un voyage d√©j√† programm√© en Pologne pour y √©tudier le polonais ‚Äì mais la bourse n‚Äôinclut pas le voyage.  C‚Äôest ma foi dans la beaut√© des c≈ìurs humaines qui me pousse √† √©crire cette lettre. campaigns.title: CoronaVirus (COVID-19)- GLOBAL CURE
campaigns.description:
Hello! I'm sure You heard about COVID-19, named also "CoronaVirus". We need to help each other to fight against this situation. 

Coronaviruses (CoV) are a large family of viruses that cause illness ranging from the common cold to more severe diseases such as¬†Middle East Respiratory Syndrome (MERS-CoV)¬†and¬†Severe Acute Respiratory Syndrome (SARS-CoV).¬†A novel coronavirus (nCoV)¬†is a new strain that has not been previously identified in humans.¬†¬†

Coronaviruses are zoonotic, meaning they are transmitted between animals and people. ¬†Detailed investigations found that SARS-CoV was transmitted from civet cats to humans and MERS-CoV from dromedary camels to humans. Several known coronaviruses are circulating in animals that have not yet infected humans.¬†

Common signs of infection include respiratory symptoms, fever, cough, shortness of breath and breathing difficulties. In more severe cases, infection can cause pneumonia, severe acute respiratory syndrome, kidney failure and even death.¬†

Standard recommendations to prevent infection spread include regular hand washing, covering mouth and nose when coughing and sneezing, thoroughly cooking meat and eggs. Avoid close contact with anyone showing symptoms of respiratory illness such as coughing and sneezing.

We need to STOP this virus.

Il Coronavirus non √® cos√¨ spaventoso per via delle morti in s√©, ma quanto piuttosto per via del fatto che non esiste nessuna cura. Questa √® la cosa realmente inquietante. E questo √® ci√≤ che vogliamo risolvere.

Con questa campagna fondi ci poniamo l'obbiettivo di indirizzare la ricerca verso una cura, di agire finalmente in modo attivo per una soluzione che possa salvarci in una spaventoso eventualit√† di contagio.

Noi comuni mortali non possiamo fare nient'altro se non dare il nostro contributo in forma economica ed √® esattamente quello che ti chiediamo di fare. Dona 5‚Ç¨ o quanto ritieni giusto per sovvenzionare i migliori ricercatori d'Italia e contribuisci pure tu alla scoperta di un antidoto al Coronavirus.

Il ricavato verr√† devoluto ai ricercatori che avranno raggiunto i migliori risultati (in Italia) al momento della chiusura della raccolta fondi il 20 Marzo 2020.
Verranno prese in considerazione solamente universit√† pubbliche italiane.

campaigns.title: Coronavirus Help
campaigns.description: Hello everyone, as most of you know I recently moved to China to start a new chapter of my life. ¬†Once my father passed away I knew even more-so that this change was needed in my life. It‚Äôs something I was so desperate to do not only to change my life for the better, ¬†but to make myself and my family proud. Each day I wake up thankful to be here, thankful that I went through with this dream and continue to make my dad proud.¬† Since the CoronaVirus decided to appear, not only has the world come to a stop still but also my mind and mental health as abruptly come crashing down. So much so I‚Äôve contemplating giving up this dream completely, so much so that Im sleep depriving myself, so much so that anxiety and panic attacks have become second nature. Then I think about leaving again, something I know will make me feel like an even bigger failure. During this outbreak it has left me uncertain of how I might continue to not only have a roof over my head, ¬†but cover basic needs such as food and water. The virus has stopped all schools from opening, which in turn means us teachers are left with nothing. As it stands the schools are not due to open any time soon which does mean basic living necessities will be something I no longer have access to. Food and water will no longer be a viable option, let alone having somewhere to live.¬† All I‚Äôm asking for is help, in any way shape or form. Every penny counts, and I will use whatever funds are raised to cover living expenses as well as manage to feed and water myself. Any further funds that I manage to raise will goto a charity that helps individuals in crisis situations. I don‚Äôt expect anyone to donate however if you choose to, just know that I am beyond grateful. I will forever be truly thankful ‚ô•Ô∏è

The elderly living in poorer areas do not realize the seriousness of the coronavirus, and also are unable to afford the sudden spike in prices in masks. Donating money to this go fund me will raise money to buy surgical masks that will be shipped directly to Korea to provide direct help to prevent this epidemic from spreading more.  I am a Korean high school student in California that wants to help South Korea, especially because I have families living there and know the severity of the situation. Thank you for your donation and efforts to help South Korean citizens.

campaigns.title: Golden Saddle Coronavirus fund
campaigns.description: Hello and thank you for visiting my campaign.  My name is Felicity Stanway and since June 2018 I've had the amazing opportunity to work in the beautiful city of Guilin as both coach, consultant and technical director of Golden Saddle Equestrian Club. It has been both a challenge and a joy in helping to raise the awareness of horse welfare and best work practices whilst educating the next generation of coaches and riders in what was a fast growing equestrian industry in the economic powerhouse that is China.    The goals at Golden Saddle were to become one of the leading equestrian educators in the country with the focus being on educating the local industry about best world practices for horse welfare, riding and coach education, whilst also being a sustainable learning centre for the greater public connecting people with the wonderful healing powers of the horse.¬†     The outbreak of the COVID19 virus it has created an unplanned industry crushing scenario.¬† With the whole country in lockdown up to 70% of all businesses country wide have been forced to cease operations having what will be a national economic crisis. Ultimately this means that Golden Saddle along with many other equestrian clubs and businesses are trying to survive without any income.¬†¬† The unfortunate situation that sets a business such as Golden Saddle apart is that in such a shutdown with 48 horses needing care the club cannot simply lay off staff and close production until things blow over. The horses still need care and exercise and all the daily chores still need doing.     I've created this fund to help the man that has shared with me his vision, Mr Yu, my boss, known by his English name Kerwin.¬†¬† He had a dream at a young age to own his own horse club, and in October last year he made the very bold decision to buy out the other partner in the club in order to be able to have full control over the clubs future and entrusting the horses welfare and management to me.¬† Unfortunately due to the virus outbreak and after much consultation the tough decision was made that I was to come home amidst the fears that the virus spread and lockdown would potentially continue for an unspecified amount of time and the financial future of the club was in question.¬†     Kerwin has been the most supportive and enthusiastic boss and it has been heartbreaking coming home and leaving my team and the horses behind with the fate of their future unknown.¬† My goal of this Go Fund Me campaign is to raise enough funds to help support Kerwin over the next few months in keeping the club running whilst China recovers from this horrible unforeseen tragedy. Thankfully before the new year the club had purchased enough feed supply to keep the horses going to until at least the end of March, it's the staff costs that will be the main outgoings. With a fulltime staff of 6 coaches and 4 support staff, who are all currently in lockdown living at the¬†club, my dedicated former team are already willing to sacrifice part of their pay just to stay and keep the club going.¬† These people have not only been my work colleagues over the last 18 months they have become my family, so although I am now not able to be with them my goal is to help keep them all employed and give the club the best possible chance of recovery for the future.         Your donations will be massively appreciated and contribute not only to the Golden Saddle club but the future of horse welfare in China starting with the wonderful 48 horses that call Golden Saddle home.  There will also be plan for the future to create a website where you will be able to check in and virtually meet all of the Golden Saddle staff and horses personally and see the difference your donation has made.  So in conclusion I would like to personally thank each of you for reading my cause and donating to keep Golden Saddle alive, and hope that one day you may get a chance to visit the team at Golden Saddle and take pride in the knowledge that you helped keep an amazing dream alive.

campaigns.title: Fundings to buy masks for hospitals in Wuhan
campaigns.description:
Hello everyone! We are a group of students of Wuhan! Some of us are back to their countries for quarantine but we want to help our city win this battle with the #coronavirus!! We decided to make this gofundme project to help with the little we can and buy some masks for hospitals in #Wuhan.   
 

  Chinese health officials reported on 2/29/2020 that there had been 2838 deaths from the outbreak and 79394 cases of the coronavirus.  
 

 Tons of medical workers are still struggling on the front line , the day and night¬†battling with the virus and trying to save as many people as possible, but they need to protect themselves first to do so!! We achieved our first goal and helped the first hospital but we are not going to stop and we want to continue helping with the help of our friends around the world.     With the money we already raised, we sent an order for masks, gloves and suits by the doctors of a hospital that arrived this 02/23/2020       
 

        
 

   From February 29 to March 1, the Mercadito ON in Arica, Chile, together with volunteers from China, invite you to be part of donations to help Jingxia District Red Cross Hospital to face the CoVid19 virus. Address: Anzuelo y Carbones Restaurant, Camino Azapan n 4040, Arica, Chile  
 

  
 

  Wuhan and China gave us a lot, a home, a job, a place to study, this is the moment to give back!! If you want to contribute for this cause, share the link and thank you a thousand times!    Let‚Äôs fight together! Wuhan jiayou Ê≠¶Ê±âÂä†Ê≤πÔºÅ

Decidimos hacer este proyecto de gofundme para ayudar con lo poco que podemos y comprar ¬†materiales m√©dicos para hospitales en #Wuhan.   Funcionarios de salud chinos informaron el 29/02/2020 que hubo 2838 muertes por el brote y 79394 casos de coronavirus.   Muchos doctores y enfermeros todav√≠a est√°n en la l√≠nea del frente, el d√≠a y la noche luchando contra el virus y tratando de salvar a la mayor cantidad de personas posible, ¬°pero necesitan protegerse primero para hacerlo! Logramos nuestro primer objetivo y ayudamos al primer hospital pero no nos vamos a parar y queremos seguir ayudando con la ayuda de nuestros amigos en todo el mundo.   Con el dinero que ya recaudamos, enviamos un pedido de mascarillas, guantes y trajes por los doctores de un hospital que llegaron este 23/02/2020      
 

       Desde el 29 de Febrero hasta el 1 de Marzo el Mercadito ON de Arica, Chile juntos con los voluntarios de China os invitan a ser parte de las donaciones en ayuda de Jingxia District Red Cross Hospital para enfrentar al virus CoVid19. campaigns.title: Ac Sapphire music Release & corona cancels tour:(
campaigns.description: Hello dear friends of the world!¬†  I have been writing, recording, transforming and moving emotions around in my heart to release music into the world for quite some time now!¬†  I have paid for everything thus far myself and need to recoup my recording costs as well as make physical copies of my music to sell at shows and other cool merchandise! I also need to get some work done on my car before I go on the tour and buy some new gear to take on the road with me! There are so many expenses on this music path!¬†  I need to raise the money as soon as possible to get it all sorted before I go on tour in the middle of March with  Lauren Ruth Ward .¬† It's a dream come true to go on tour with her and I couldn't have gotten this far without your support.¬†¬†   Anyone that donates will receive a digital download of my upcoming EP Omni Present, all of my releases for 2020 and a few other past releases.¬†¬†   If reach my goal of $7770 I will be donating ¬†10% to the  Rock n' Roll Camp for Girls. ¬† This is an amazing nonprofit that empower girls and non-binary children through music.    I sing from my heart for the love of music and for the love of sharing something personal with people. I feel honored to be on the life path of being a musician and your contribution will help me stay on that path!   Thank you so much for your generosity, love, and support!¬†

Abbiamo bisogno di aiuto velocemente, non avremmo mai voluto arrivare a questo, ma quando si ha famiglia si deve mettere da parte l'orgoglio personale! A tutti coloro che ci aiuteranno invieremo un regalo personalizzato come segno di riconoscenza, che sar√† nulla in confronto all'importanza dell'aiuto che ci darete ma non possiamo ignorare quello che farete per noi!  We are two family-owned companies, Father and Son who were finally recovering from years of crisis. Right now because of the Coronavirus that has spread in our areas, we are struggling to stay open! We do not know how long we will be able to resist, we cannot afford advertising or investments to continue and with these funds we hope to do it! We need help quickly, we never wanted to do this, but when we have a family we have to put aside personal pride! To all those who help us we will send a personalized gift as a sign of gratitude, which will be nothing compared to the importance of the help you will give us but we cannot ignore what you will do for us!

The incubation period of Wuhan Coronavirus is very long (1~2weeks) which is why it's spreading so fast all over China and globally. Japan, South Korea, the United States, Thailand, Singapore, Vietnam, the United Kindom, and Austrilia all have cases detected.¬†   People in Wuhan are all in danger. campaigns.title: Coronavirus Enters Through Your Eyes
campaigns.description:
We are Infecting Ourselvs ¬†  If you have been following the¬† the Coronavirus outbreak, you may remember Dr. Li Wenliang. He was the whistleblower¬† doctor who tried to¬† worn others about the a new Coronavirus were showing up in patients eyes.  Dr. Wenliang was an ophthalmologist who first identified the Coronavirus as patients with severe infection in one or both eyes were presenting. He saw the relationship between these unusual eye infections and this developing into pneumonia.

 ¬†
 

 The world was saddened by his death after constructing the Coronavirus now known as Covid19.¬†     People are Infecting Themselves ¬†  The virus is spread through hand to face or hand to eye contact. People are touching infected¬† surfaces¬† such as¬† door knobs ,¬† elevator buttons¬† grocery carts and many other hard surfaces. It has being proven that the coronavirus can live on hard surfaces as long as 9 days.¬†  If someone is infected with the Coronavirus and coughs into their hands or is simplimatic the transmission occurs when you touch that same door handle then rub your eyes. This is how coronavirus is spread.      Doctors Urge Patients to Wash¬† ¬†Hands Frequently¬†   Doctors are urging the public to becone more vigilant and aware of the surfaces they are touching. Any surface especially hard surfaces which are touched frequently may be contaminated with the Coronavirus. In a busy setting such as a school or office building, hundreds of people are touching the same door handles railings and other hard surfaces then touching their face and eyes.   The Average Person Touches Their Face 2,000 Tines a Day   Several studies have shown that on average we touch our faces between 1,200 and 2,000 times each day. We must become much more aware our habit of touching door handles and other common areas then touching our faces or rubbing our eyes. Dr. Li Wenliang said "If we can't break the habit of touching our faces we will never beat Coronavirus".    Wearing Googles Prevent Hand Eye Contact ¬†  ¬† Wearing goggles is one simple measure we can take two dramatically decrease the speed in which this virus is spreading. The goggles will also remind us not to touch other areas of the face.   3D Printed Goggles ¬†      People who are blind generally touch more surfaces then¬† the average sighted¬†person. This dramatically increases the chances they will become infected.   You might remember me mentioning my interest with 3D printing. Right now I have all of my available printers replicating goggles of all sizes. I can currently¬† print 40 sets of goggles¬† each day. I desperately need more printers to meet the demand. I am also emailing the files to anybody with a 3D printer who wish to produce goggles for their friends and families.¬†   ¬†I am handing the googles for free to anybody who is in need. I am asking others with 3D printers to do the same.   I have established a GoFundMe account to help cover the cost of filament and other expenses expenses associated with¬† making and distributing the goggles.     gf.me/u/xkzvw9  Below is a short 3 minute video warning about hand eye contact.    https://youtu.be/DfGyYrtTheI     Here is an in-depth 21 minute video that discusses the issue in greater detail.    https://youtu.be/DPkLApDRJME

campaigns.title: Coronavirus Improvised Masks
campaigns.description:
Dear Friends,
 

  The Coronavirus (COVID19)  continues to spread throughout the world. Controlling the spread requires the mobilization of our combined efforts to fight the threat of the pandemic. A glaring problem is that there is a possible shortage of medical supplies including N95 respirator masks. The biggest producer (China) is the epicenter of the virus and might not have enough for themselves much less for the rest of the world. This means that if the virus spreads to more countries, there will be a global shortage of N95 masks. Without proper protection, individuals will be more likely to contract the virus spread it to even more people.
 

   Article on demand for 270 million face masks ¬† 
 

 One possible solution is to create improvised respirator masks. These masks would have to be relatively cheap to make from household materials. One possible design is an improvised gas mask with Cut 2-Liter soda bottle, duct tape, rubber bands, cloth, and crushed charcoal. Such a design will help prevent contracting the virus not only from airborne contaminants but also preventing the user from touching their face which is also an entry point of the virus through their eyes, nose, mouth. This simple design could be made by anyone willing any improvements would be most welcome.
 

 My proposal would be to use modern technology and methods to mobilize efforts for distributed production of improvised respirator masks. Using shared Google Sheets and Google Forms, orders can be grouped by city and zip code.¬† Facebook marketplace could also be a place to advertise. "Manufacturers" would buy materials and construct the masks. Customers would fill Google forms and be matched with local manufactures who would then, like Uber/Postmates, deliver the masks. To mitigate legal/fees, transactions would be made by cash(after being disinfected)/venmo/paypal upon delivery accounting for material/labor costs. Hopefully, healthy competition and innovation will mitigate price gouging that is inherent in emergency scenarios.
 

 The purpose of this fundraiser is to incentivise action and create infrastructure around the project in order to scale properly and hopefully globally. Money donated will also be given to manufacturers to create masks for local hospitals in areas affected. Hopefully, together we can ensure action to fight this impending threat and provide a glimmer of hope to those affected.
 

 ¬†
 

  Thank you for your support.

campaigns.title: Help Save Lives from Coronavirus in Wuhan
campaigns.description: The 2019 novel coronavirus (COVID-19) has infected 71,334 people worldwide. 1,775 people are now known to have died from the virus. Six health workers have died and 1,716 have been infected since the outbreak. In Wuhan, where the virus was first detected, 242 people died on the 13th February alone.    As a group of academics at  Cardiff University , we are in solidarity with our fellow collaborators in¬† Hubei Cancer Hospital in Wuhan  who are working against the clock in fighting the coronavirus and saving lives. We particularly wish to support our Chinese colleagues by funding protective equipment for frontline medical staff due to their critical shortage of medical resources. These individuals are working tirelessly to protect us, so it is vital that we protect them.     Before the outbreak, Hubei Cancer Hospital was supporting us on various projects including early cancer diagnostics using circulating biomarkers and evaluation of cancer immunotherapy effectiveness. We had two PhD students working in Wuhan since November 2019 on these collaborative projects.    In view of the increasing number of coronavirus infected patients in Wuhan after the initial outbreak, Hubei Cancer Hospital started to provide healthcare service to severely infected cases and reported their critical shortage of protective equipment.    All the donations will go solely to purchase NIOSH-certified N95 respirators and other protective equipment for medical staff in Hubei Cancer Hospital.¬† We hope more patients can receive effective treatment when adequate protective equipment is in place for medical staff. The control of the coronavirus in Wuhan is important to stop further transmission to the other countries.       The fundraising team of academics in Cardiff University aim to acquire the medical equipment using the fund and send it to Hubei Cancer Hospital by March 2020.¬† At the end of the fundraising, we will circulate a report of the use of the fund to all contributors.¬†  We are grateful for your support.   Let's battle the coronavirus together!¬†   The fundraising team (click individual names to open profile pages):  Dr Xin Yang, School of Engineering, Cardiff University   Dr Xuan Wang, School of Modern campaigns.title: Help Fight Coronavirus in Wuhan
campaigns.description: What we can do to help    The Greater China Club at the Wharton School (GCC) is organizing a fundraiser to help those in need in Wuhan to access critically important medical supplies, including facial masks, protective gloves, suits and other protective garments.   We are fortunate to have received support and to be closely working with Wharton alumni in China, including the founder of 1 Drugstore (111.com.cn, NASDAQ:YI) which is one the largest direct online pharmacy networks in China.   Our current plan is to procure medical supplies through our network in China (and potentially internationally) and to directly deliver to the designated treatment hospitals in Wuhan where the most urgent needs are.  GCC commits to providing 100% transparency to the entire process, including (1) providing prompt updates to donors on final destination of funds, (2) providing a donor-by-donor list of donations at the end of the fundraising process, and (3) engage in ongoing Q A and updates on progress of fundraise and supply procurement process, within reason.   Given we are a student organization and have no official bank account, we will be withdrawing money into the personal bank account of Eileen Gao, one of the GCC board members. The funds will be converted from USD to RMB and sent to our supplier and logistics partner 1 Drugstore's corporate account via international wire transfer. We will provide update on proof of receipt and transfer of funds when we have the details.   * Kind reminder: the platform may prompt you to enter a tip which is not related to our donation campaign. Please select "Other" if you do not wish to tip the platform in addition to your donation.    Current facts    The number of lab-confirmed cases stands at 14,000 in 23 countries as of February 2. There have been over 300 deaths, all but one in China.    To help dispel some prevailing myths around the coronavirus:    Myths: Corona is the most dangerous virus that exists Facts: The common flu kills 60 times more people annual than Corona ¬† Myths: I will die if I am diagnosed with the coronavirus Facts: An estimated 2% of cases have reported deaths and most of these deaths were associated with weaker immune systems (e.g. old age) ¬† Myths: I need to buy a hazmat suit and a N95 mask to stay protected Facts: Washing hands and sneezing into elbows are best practices to protect yourself ¬† Myths: We all need to stay away from anyone from China Facts: Coronavirus has an incubation period of around 2-14 days. Therefore if a person of Chinese descent has been living outside of China for the last 14 days or more, he/she is at no higher risk of transmitting the virus than anyone else in the broader community. ¬† As the virus has spread in China, and especially in Wuhan, hospitals reportedly have been inundated with suspected cases, and have rapidly run out of critical medical supplies, most importantly protective facial masks and suits. Below are recent official statements released by some of the hardest hit hospitals in Wuhan, appealing directly to the public for donation of medical goods.  At the same time, many governments around the world have imposed strict travel restrictions to and from China, and some have placed export restrictions on critically needed medical supplies by the abovementioned hospitals in Wuhan.  Whilst we appreciate and acknowledge the need for the efforts made by national governments to protect their own citizens, we believe times like this are when true compassion and humanitarianism need to shine through the dark clouds.    Thank you.

campaigns.title: Fight for Corona Virus in Daegu, South Korea
campaigns.description: Dear good people of the world,  I am a licensed clinical social worker and therapist in San Jose, California, LCSW 93644.  I am an immigrant myself from Daegu, South Korea and my relatives and mother still live in Daegu.   Daegu's corona virus epidemic news tells that three main emergency rooms at three hospitals have been closed/reopened due to serving patients in the last three weeks. I've heard that many public health doctors, who are medical corps non-combat physicians, are obligated to serve for treatment at Daegu, in South Korea, but they had not been provided any hotel expenses.  My hometown, Daegu, South Korea is in great stress for utilizing medical staff at hospitals in the area.   I would like to help medical staff in the hospital at Daegu so people in my hometown may get served properly.   Would you join me?   I will donate money to medical staff at hospital and doctors in Daegu, South Korea.  Hope I can raise the money by the end of March, 2020.   According to the Korea Times,   "The Daegu medical infrastructure is under great stress," he said. "They may be as exhausted as those in Wuhan. You can't let them hang out to dry"   https://www.koreatimes.co.kr/www/nation/2020/02/119_285142.html    https://www.wsj.com/articles/american-soldier-contracts-coronavirus-in-south-korea-as-government-struggles-11582706980   Today, at the New York times, I read an article relating sufferings from Syrian refugee children, donated little money to Syrian non-profit organization, Violet.   Why not my hometown Korea, this evening, my thoughts are in my hometown and what I can do for my friends, extended relatives, neighbors where I grew up.

campaigns.title: Help Cure Autumn‚Äôs Coronavirus
campaigns.description: Autumn is our sweet kitten. She has been diagnosed with a fatal disease which is caused by the corona virus is cats. This isn‚Äôt the same disease that humans can catch and is not contagious to humans. Sometimes this virus mutates and becomes known as fips. There are different types of fips but in Autumn‚Äôs case it has mutated into wet fips. The disease causes fluid build up in their organs and eventually leads to death. However there is a drug called mutian that is known to cure the disease but it is not yet available at vets throughout the world. Kittens must take the medicine for 84 days for full treatment and in most studies the majority of cats have been cured from this horrible disease. We are asking for donations to help us afford the cost of the medicine. Currently it is costing 25 dollars a day but as Autumn‚Äôs weight increases so will the dosage so it will cost more per day. We are on day 18 and have seen how well the medicine has worked for our Autumn and we really want to be able to treat her the full 84 days and give her a full life. campaigns.title: Coronavirus relief fund
campaigns.description: What if you know of a problem and a way you can help?  The problem, People around the world are being affected by current events regarding the coronavirus. Transportation suspended, postponed and cancelled for the fear of spreading the virus. Businesses shutting down because their revenue streams have stopped or slowed so much they can‚Äôt afford to pay the employees. People who work in the service industry feel the effects of this and are feeling it hard. Tips, which many in the industry depend on has come to a halt and the income they depend on to feed their family, pay the rent, and buy food has stopped. They are struggling to provide the same basic needs you and I have yet can‚Äôt because their revenue stream has come to a halt.   I know people in this industry who are telling me this is exactly what is happening to them. They reside in areas of countries where the yearly income is less than $9000 a year. When their revenue comes to a halt, it hurts, it really hurts. We feel the need to reach out and help and We can‚Äôt do it alone. Its the human thing to do, right? To help those as we would want help if were are in need. There is something said for there is power in numbers.¬†   That is where this fund and you come in. You have the opportunity to help. With your generous donation, you will provide those who are currently harmed by this event with a form of revenue. Your donation will be distributed among those hit hard. It will provide the needed help that will allow them to feed their families, make that payment for rent, buy medicine and more. It‚Äôs not the long term solution, that will come when the world gets the virus under control. In the meantime, with the help from people like you, we can provide some amount of relief that will get them by one more day.¬†   Bless you for your gift. It means a million to them.

campaigns.title: Help Save Wuhan and China!!!! (Coronavirus Relief)
campaigns.description: We know there have been other GoFundMe campaigns started, but none from Southern CA. Lets show everyone that we care (not just Southern CA).   ***UPDATE***  The Organizer Team (made up of Real Estate Professionals) has received official endorsements from: China Institute of Real Estate Appraisers and Agents (CIREA) China Alliance of Real Estate Agencies (CAREA) and we are expecting multiple others. Endorsements can be viewed at:   https://www.dropbox.com/sh/jagcamh39kxt48y/AACdwoPNSU4K1qQqjrtHCIa7a?dl=0     ***UPDATE 2***  Our first shipment has been sent out on February 18, 2020 and included 53x N95 Face Mask Respirators, 825x Face Mask Respirators, 24x Safety Glasses, and 81x "Sealed" Safety Goggles. Purchased and shipped via Mexico and ETA February 28, 2020. Shipments have been sent to Beijing in order to be distributed to Wuhan and Hubei region where it is needed the most.   WHY DONATIONS ARE NEEDED:  Now more than ever we all need to stand up and show our support to combat this Global Crisis that coronavirus has caused and continues to cause. This is not limited to just China/Asia and effects are starting to show around the Globe; socially, culturally, and economically.¬†  OVER 70,000 individuals have contracted the virus, and while the bulk of cases are in China, cases are spreading all over the Globe.  -Many cities in China are in "lockdown" mode with many residents afraid to even go outside (even to shop for daily goods). Posts floating around the internet show Beijing and Shanghai looking like a ghost town. Over 50 Million residents in Wuhan City and Hubei Province are in lockdown. -Chinese New Year Holiday (also known as Spring Festival) which is traditionally a time of celebration and visiting friends/family has been detrimentally affected. Many restaurants, stores, malls, amusement parks (Both of Asia's Disneyland's), shopping malls, etc have been voluntarily closed down until further notice to help reduce the spread of coronavirus. The CNY has officially been extended to keep part of the workforce from going back to work. Schools have been out and will be off indefinitely until the situation improves. -Multiple Global airlines have reduced or outright cancelled their China routes to help combat the spread of coronavirus, some as far as May 2020 (Delta, United, American Airlines, Cathay Pacific, Air India, etc). Chinese travel agencies were given a mandate by the government to cease travel bookings/operations until further notice with hefty fines if they continue business -Multiple counties have restricted access from travelers traveling from China.    HOW TO HELP:  Step 1: Donate here, any amount will be a GREAT help in this time of need.  Step 2: We will collect the money raised to purchase N-95 masks, surgical masks, protective goggles, gloves, gowns, and other in-demand medical supplies. -Supplies will be purchased both locally in USA and within China to be shipped directly to hospitals in need. -Funds will be disbursed to local Organizations/Associations within Wuhan and Greater Hebei Province (including Social Welfare Groups, Medical Assistance Groups, etc)  Step 3: We will ship the supplies directly to Wuhan, China and/or surrounding areas! As well as work only with trusted and reputable organizations/associations. (FYI that Red Cross China unfortunately is NOT the most reputable and has been scandal ridden in recent years. They have a huge inventory of facemarks that they refuse to distribute, sitting in warehouses).  Step 4: We will provide photo proof/receipts as funds are used or disbursed.¬† Dropbox link with photos/documentation:¬† https://www.dropbox.com/sh/jagcamh39kxt48y/AACdwoPNSU4K1qQqjrtHCIa7a?dl=0    VOLUNTEERS NEEDED: ¬† -help spread this GoFundMe campaign -source local avenues to purchase listed medical supplies at wholesale price, as well as locate cheaper options for freight shipping goods direct to affected areas in China -identify organizations/associations within China that can best disburse donated funds to assistance most needed in China -contact  spencer@thehoogroup.com ¬†or  robertmiller@robertmiller.com ¬†to inquire and be added to our volunteer team.   ABOUT THE CAMPAIGN ORGANIZERS:  -Spencer Hoo is a Global Real Estate Professional (some might say influencer) who has worked extensively with China and Greater Asia for over the last decade. Both bringing Buyer and Investors over to the USA as well as providing safe and stable investments within Asia (and soon Latin America). He is often invited to speak internationally or interviewed for publications (online and print) on Global Real Estate related topics. He is currently the Chair for the California Association of REALTORS (200,000+ membership) Global Real Estate Forum and member of their Board of Directors. He has also served as Chair for the Award Winning Orange County REALTORS (OCR) Global Business Alliance Committee and past member of their Board of Directors, as well as active member or leadership with National Association of REALTORS, Asian Real Estate Association of America, National Association of Hispanic Real Estate Professionals, Chinese American Real Estate Professionals Association, etc.  -Robert Miller is a Global Financier and Rainmaker who has advised individuals, businesses and governments for over five decades, on four continents and in two languages (English and Spanish). He is the author of ‚ÄúRainmaking: Impacting the World Through the Power of Emotions and the Magic of Storytelling‚Äù and a frequent public speaker.. He is active in the local community as well as Asian Real Estate Association of America and National Association of Hispanic Real Estate Professionals.

campaigns.title: CoronaVirus Food Bank of Atlanta for Seniors
campaigns.description:
Many Senior Citizens are afraid to leave their homes because folks of age are more likely to catch the virus and less likely to survive it.
 

 Especially folks with compromised immune systems.
 

 My plan is to purchase non-perishable foods with donations,¬† group them into balanced daily portions and seal them in sturdy Burn Bags.
 

 Burn Bags will be stored in a secured, disinfected warehouse for 10-14 days until any potential contaminants have died off - then deliver them to the doorsteps of Seniors in need of our services.  Directions on our Burn Bags will be clear:
 

 "Burn Bag" is to be burned in a safe area before opening.¬† A water source should be close by should fire to extinguish fire if need be.¬† Fireplaces, barbeque grills and metal trash cans are ideal for this purpose.  At this point, the food we deliver will be free of any risk of coronavirus contamination.

The CDC (Center for Data Computations) has yet to identify the potential effect of the hevid20 strain, so we are asking for help in mitigating this situation. To make matters worse, is that the already coronavirus19 (covid19) has exhausted needed supplies and has caused transshipment routes to be redirected. All funds will go towards ensuring that the needed supplies are distributed in a timely and safe manner. Please support the efforts to combat the heinekenvirus20 situation. All donations accepted and appreciated.

campaigns.title: Coronavirus Victims
campaigns.description: The Centers for Disease Control and Prevention (CDC) continues to closely monitor an outbreak of a 2019 novel coronavirus (2019-nCoV) in Wuhan city, Hubei Province, China that began in December 2019.  The updated list of new cases around your city are available at  https://www.cdc.gov/coronavirus/2019-ncov/index.html     CDC has established an Incident Management system to coordinate a domestic and international public health response to checkmate this virus.   Funding of the above project is quite a huge cost to control the spread. Support all the urgent humanitarian needs of the CDC with your financial gifts and donations.

campaigns.title: Coronavirus Fundraiser
campaigns.description: This is a fundraiser organized by students who attend Myers Park High School, and we are raising money to help a very important cause that is going on in the world, which is the coronavirus outbreak. There is no cure for this disease and help is needed in many ways because it has spread all over the world. We are trying to make an impact on the fight against this global pandemic.¬†  Although this coronavirus originally spread from animals to humans, it‚Äôs been confirmed that this strain of the virus can now spread between humans. Similar to the common cold, the coronavirus is spread when a person coughs or sneezes. Just as there is no treatment for the common cold, there are no specific treatments for the new coronavirus. While scientists are working to develop anti-virals and a vaccine, it won‚Äôt be widely available in the near future.  Please consider joining us and supporting the efforts in fighting against the Coronavirus today. Your support will help individuals and communities battle the coronavirus outbreak in all the affected countries.¬†  All donations will go to buying badly needed supplies like medical gloves and other items and then sent to hospitals and medical centers around the world that need them.

campaigns.title: Turn in Your Masks to End a Pandemic
campaigns.description: As most of you all are aware, the Coronavirus (COVID-19) is spreading across the world. Due to fear and misinformation surrounding the Pandemic many people who need Personal Protective Equipment (PPE) are not getting it.   PPE such as the  N95 Respirators  have been  sold out  across the world. According to the CDC the best way to prevent the spread of the virus is to wash your hands, don't touch your face, and cover your mouth and nose when coughing/sneezing.   Individuals who really need the mask are  health care providers  treating the sick and  those who have the virus!     I will be collecting new/unused N95 masks and raising money for shipping of the masks worldwide to hospitals and areas of confirmed cases. Please don't buy masks for yourself! Send them in so people who really need them can have them!   Please donate and help stop the spread.  *Shipping address to Follow*  Sources:   https://www.cdc.gov/coronavirus/2019-ncov/hcp/healthcare-supply-ppe.html#who-needs-ppe

campaigns.title: Help Raise Money for Corona virus
campaigns.description: Let's save some lives. We have¬† now lost thousands to this horrible disease, Let's try to prevent more. All proceeds raised by this fundraiser will go straight to the CDC, WHO, and any other agency that helps keep us safe. This is a scary and hard to contain disease, spreading like wildfire around the world, we need your help to contain it. Please donate today and together, lets help save some lives.

campaigns.title: Battle Against the Coronavirus: Wuhan at Risk
campaigns.description: The decade of the 2020s has finally arrived. In the first month of this year, however, a sudden outbreak of the  novel Coronavirus  turned the entire world into a mess and put everyone on alert.  This novel Coronavirus is a contagious virus originated from Wuhan, China that can cause symptoms such as fever, cough, breathing difficulties, pneumonia, severe respiratory syndromes, and even death.  It expanded rapidly after it was developed through  different ways of transmission including animals to humans and humans to humans,  just like how common cold is spread. ¬†Several countries around the globe including  China, United States, Japan, Australia, France, Germany, Canada, Singapore, Malaysia, Korea, and Finland  were already found to be infected with this lethal virus.¬†  According to the Chinese government officials, t his novel Coronavirus first appeared in a seafood market on December 12, 2019. Within a short month, the number of people who are confirmed to be infected with this coronavirus had already become 14,628 along with 305 deaths.  The number has continued to climb higher and on January 30, 2020, the  W.H.O (World Health Organization) declared the outbreak of this novel Coronavirus to be a global health emergency.  Starting from February 1, 2020, t ravel to China was restricted  and this would lead to  huge economic downfalls   in every single country, especially China.¬†    Currently,  tons of doctors and medical workers were fighting against the Coronavirus at the front line, and many of them had sacrificed their lives . With a tremendous amount of infected patients,  China and many countries were facing medical shortages.  Most of the hospitals in China  desperately need supplies including masks, goggles, and protective suits .  Without these types of equipment, the medical workers can be easily exposed to the Coronavirus and this can make the situation worse.    So, we need your help! We appreciate everyone that is willing to participate in this fundraiser and  all of the generous contributions from you will be used to purchase protective medical equipment including protective suits, N95 masks, and medical goggles.  They could also be sent to China and  help scientists in research for the cure to this lethal virus.  All of these were in  urgent need for those medical workers in the front line.  We will  ensure all funds that we received will be used to purchase these types of equipment ¬†and we will update the processes.¬†   Let‚Äôs all fight against the Coronavirus together and pray for Wuhan!

campaigns.title: Dental machine for One Tail At A Time
campaigns.description: My name is Mel and my dog's name is Bella. If you know me then you know my deep bond with Bella and how she's led me to the path that I am on today, advocating for animal's in Chicago. You may also know that the last several years Bella's dental disease has worsened due to genetics, causing her to lose majority of her teeth. I've been lucky enough to be in a position where I can provide Bella with the medical care she needs, but that's not the case for several dogs in Chicago. While working at Chicago Animal Control, a common issue I see with dogs is severe dental disease that has gone untreated, causing unnecessary pain and lowering the dogs quailty of life. Dental disease is easy to overlook because you can't see it at first glance and that's why One Tail at a Time wants to purchase this equipment and make it part of a standard screening for all dogs in their rescue.  One Tail at a Time is opening a medical facility that will provide medical care (INCLUDING DENTAL!!!) to dogs they take into their rescue¬†but not only that, they will be providing medical and dental care for Chicagoland Rescue and Support Program (CRISP), CRISP is a organization that assists low income families provide medical care for their family dogs.  Bella and I know the importance of dental care and how it can drastically impact your pets quality of life, so we want to be able to sponsor this piece of equipment and make sure every dog is able to live a comfortable life without oral pain. All funds raised will be directly donated to One Tail at a Time to purchase this very needed dental equipment.¬†  More information about One Tail At A Time: One Tail at a Time (‚ÄúOTAT‚Äù) is a no-kill, 501(c)3 all-breed dog rescue committed to lowering euthanasia rates in the greater Chicagoland area. OTAT achieves this through the rescue and adoption of dogs in need, comprehensive support of adopters, and community outreach including humane education programs and assistance for disadvantaged and low-income families.

campaigns.title: My son has the Corona Virus
campaigns.description: About a month ago my son and I went to China for a vacation. We went To Henan, China, right outside of Hubei. We stayed for two weeks. When it was time to leave I didn't see any signs of my son being sick. After about 2 weeks he told me he felt like he was sick. We went to our family doctor and they said it was just the flu so they gave us antibiotics to help. ¬†Come now, the symptoms have gotten worse. We went to a different doctor about 30 minuets away from where we live and they said that he had the corona virus. I'm starting this gofundme to help pay for my sons medical fees. Anything will help.

campaigns.title: Covid-19 VENEZIA - AIUTACI A RESISTERE! ENG-ITA
campaigns.description: See our website ¬†  Coronavirus Disease 2019, commonly known as 'Coronavirus' or Covid-19, has fallen into our lives, firstly was as a problem for others:¬† In China there was a strange pneumonia epidemic, derived from bats or snakes.....one of the many news on TV!. ¬† Our lives continued to flow regularly, nothing seemed to be able to shake them so deeply, so quickly, as it actually happened within a weekend; that will remain forever etched in the memory, mine and of millions of other people.¬†  A weekend during which in northern Italy, psychosis spread freely, without any type of government filter, perhaps placed to protect businesses, from microscopic ones to multinationals. The media screamed all day long in an emergency, causing a panic reaction in the population, who rushed to stock up on food even if we were at war, deserted the streets, shops and restaurants. The same news was then reported by the media from all over the world, in fact generating what is today the real national emergency, or the inevitable and strong "economic crisis" that will affect most anyone who has to do with incoming tourism in Italy. DEFINITELY throughout 2020.¬† ¬† "My name is Stefano Santaiti, and I am the General Manager of Villa Patriarca hotel, in Mirano (Ve)".  A beautiful Venetian Villa from the 1700s; located in the lands of Tiepolo, in Mirano, a town full of historic parks and enchanting places absolutely to be seen, a few minutes from Venice. We have infected people very close but none of them are here in our municipality/town.  However, Coronavirus IMMEDIATELY brought us enormous economic hardships.¬† We had 95% of the rooms booked canceled. The prospect, UNFORTUNATELY, is to close FOREVER our VILLA..would be a tragedy not only for me but also for the families of all my staff, on average 20 people.  My pride prevents me from asking for charity, even in this difficult situation, therefore I had this idea:¬† ¬† Selling 'social' vouchers: let me explain better: anyone who wants to help us not end up in the middle of a road, will receive an 8-year voucher for the same amount, which can be spent in any of our services: pizzeria, restaurant, hotel, swimming pool.  Basically, if you want to support us, you will have a unique opportunity: You will have helped good people in difficulty due to this situation, and in return you will receive a voucher valid for 8 years (the residual duration of my rent-contract) That you can use here our beautiful property when you will want and, I will have the opportunity to shake your hand and thank you personally on behalf of all the staff, for helping us in a moment of extreme need.   Thank you.¬†  ---------------------   Guarda il nostro sito web ¬†  Il Coronavirus Desease 2019, comunemente detto ‚ÄòCoronavirus‚Äô o Covid-19, √® entrato in sordina nelle nostre vite, prima come un problema di altri: nella lontana Cina stava verificandosi una strana epidemia di polmonite, derivata dai pipistrelli o serpenti... una delle tante notizie da Tg.  Le nostre vite continuavano a scorrere regolarmente, nulla sembrava poterle scuotere cos√¨ profondamente, cos√¨ velocemente, come √® poi effettivamente successo nel giro di un weekend; che rimarr√† perennemente impresso nella memoria, mia e di altre milioni di persone.  Un weekend durante il quale nel nord Italia, la psicosi ha dilagato liberamente, senza alcun tipo di filtro governativo, posto magari a tutela delle imprese, da quelle microscopiche alle multinazionali. I media hanno urlato per tutto il giorno all‚Äôemergenza, provocando una reazione di panico nella popolazione, che si √® precipitata a far scorte alimentari nemmeno fossimo in guerra, ha disertato le strade, i negozi ed i ristoranti. Le stesse notizie sono poi state riportate dai media di tutto il mondo, generando di fatto quella che √® oggi la vera emergenza nazionale, ovvero la inevitabile e forte crisi economica che colpir√† maggiormente chiunque abbia a che fare con il turismo incoming in Italia. Sicuramente per tutto il 2020.  Mi chiamo Stefano Santaiti, e sono il gestore di Villa Patriarca hotel , a Mirano (Ve)  Una bellissima Villa Veneta del 1700; posta nelle terre del Tiepolo, a Mirano, cittadina piena di parchi storici e luoghi incantevoli assolutamente da vedere, a pochi minuti da Venezia. Abbiamo dei contagiati molto vicini. Ma nessuno qui nel comune.  Ciononostante Il Coronavirus ci ha messi in ginocchio. Abbiamo avuto la cancellazione del 95% delle camere prenotate. La prospettiva √® quella di chiudere, che sarebbe la rovina , oltre che per la mia, anche per le famiglie di tutti i nostri collaboratori, in media 20 persone.  L‚Äôorgoglio mi impedisce di chiedere la carit√†, anche in questa difficile situazione, pertanto ho avuto questa idea:  Vendere dei voucher ‚Äòsociali‚Äô: mi spiego meglio: chiunque vorr√† contribuire a non farci finire in mezzo ad una strada, ricever√† un buono valido 8 anni di pari importo, spendibile in qualsiasi nostro servizio: pizzeria, ristorante, hotel, piscina.  In pratica, se vorrete sostenerci, avrete un‚Äôoccasione unica: Avrete aiutato delle brave persone in difficolt√† a causa di questa epidemia , e riceverete in cambio un buono valido 8 anni ( la durata residua del mio contratto!) da poter usare qui da noi quando vorrete, in modo che io possa avere l‚Äôoccasione di stringervi la mano e ringraziarvi personalmente a nome di tutto lo staff, per averci aiutato in un momento di estremo bisogno.   Grazie.   Lo staff  Villa Patriarca Hotel   Mirano (VENEZIA)

campaigns.title: fight coronavirus with medical protection and food
campaigns.description: Whenever there are outbreaks of respiratory illnesses, one of the first things you see is more people wearing face masks. As more coronavirus cases are reported, demand for face masks will increase ‚Äî as will their prices there's already been some serious price  Authorities cut most transport links to the central Chinese city last week to try to halt the spread of the flu-like virus. Thousands of cases have been reported in China, with a small number in countries including the United States, Thailand and Singapore.  The unprecedented move prompted people in the city of 11 million to rush to supermarkets to stock up on instant noodles, vegetables and whatever else they could put their hands on.  Residents say there has yet to be an acute shortage of food, although shelves are cleared quickly when goods arrive.  Shouguang, the country‚Äôs biggest vegetable production base, in the eastern Shandong province, has been asked to deliver 600 tons of fresh vegetables to Wuhan every day in the next 10 to 15 days, said an official in Sunjiaji, one of Shouguang‚Äôs villages.  Sunjiaji, whose main crop is cucumbers, was tasked with sending 60 tons in less than seven hours.  China‚Äôs largest food and agricultural firm COFCO Group and China Grain Reserves Corporation (Sinograin) Group have stepped up supplies of rice, meat and cooking oil to Hubei province  wuhan You need this kind of help to provide masks and food for the most needy

campaigns.title: Corona Virus Pandemic
campaigns.description: The Greater China Club at the Wharton School (GCC) is organizing a fundraiser to help those in need in Wuhan to access critically important medical supplies, including facial masks, protective gloves, suits and other protective garments.   We are fortunate to have received support and to be closely working with Wharton alumni in China, including the founder of 1 Drugstore (111.com.cn, NASDAQ:YI) which is one the largest direct online pharmacy networks in China.   Our current plan is to procure medical supplies through our network in China (and potentially internationally) and to directly deliver to the designated treatment hospitals in Wuhan where the most urgent needs are.  GCC commits to providing 100% transparency to the entire process, including (1) providing prompt updates to donors on final destination of funds, (2) providing a donor-by-donor list of donations at the end of the fundraising process, and (3) engage in ongoing Q A and updates on progress of fundraise and supply procurement process, within reason.   Given we are a student organization and have no official bank account, we will be withdrawing money into the personal bank account of Eileen Gao, one of the GCC board members. The funds will be converted from USD to RMB and sent to our supplier and logistics partner 1 Drugstore's corporate account via international wire transfer. We will provide update on proof of receipt and transfer of funds when we have the details.   * Kind reminder: The platform may prompt you to enter a tip which is not related to our donation campaign. Please select "Other" if you do not wish to tip the platform in addition to your donation

campaigns.title: CORONA virus - COVID-19
campaigns.description: COVID-19¬†  Peoples and family across the world The world is dying and we need you !!  Because this virus is so new, not much is known about it yet  The virus is a type of coronavirus ‚Äî a family of viruses that can cause illnesses such as the common cold, severe acute respiratory syndrome ¬†and Middle East respiratory syndrome.  The new coronavirus appears to be spreading from person to person. It may be spread by respiratory droplets when someone infected with the virus coughs or sneezes. It's unclear exactly how contagious the virus is.  recommend that you take the usual precautions for avoiding respiratory viruses:  Wash your hands often with soap and water or use an alcohol-based hand sanitizer. Cover your mouth and nose with your elbow or a tissue when you cough or sneeze. Avoid touching your eyes, nose and mouth if your hands aren't clean. Avoid close contact with anyone who is sick. Clean surfaces you often touch. Stay home from work, school and public areas if you're sick.

campaigns.title: Coronavirus
campaigns.description: Due to the coronavirus breakout in China, many communities and towns are locked down to keep the virus from spreading. People from my hometown, which is a small town in far northwest of China called Qitai, are confined into their own homes like other cities for over one month. This has created great difficulties for people who have not much savings for emergencies like this. I just heard from my dad, who is currently working as a security guard for the community center, that a lot people called the center everyday because they don't have the basic necessities to get by each day, food, water, money to pay for electricity, gas and wifi, etc. wifi is needed because kids are schooled via internet at home due to the emergency. The center is trying their best to help, but it's not enough. I am currently studying in the University of Leeds in UK, so there is only so much I can do for the community I grow up in myself because I spend almost all of my money in this study. I am really grateful and sending enormous amount of love for anyone who could chip in to help my community and I am also grateful if you feel called to help but not be able to, my love and gratitude goes to you all as well. The money raised will be used to buy flour powder, rice, cooking oil, which are the most basic food people in my hometown eat everyday. Only the most basic food will be bought for them because I am thinking to help as many people as possible to survive first ¬†and if I can raise more, vegetables and meat will be bought to help them. I don't have photos or videos available at the moment due to the lockdown, but I will try to post them to help keep you updated with the process as soon as possible. Thanks again for all the help and kind hearts out there and much love to you all.xxxxxxxxxxxx...

campaigns.title: Help LLP Expand the SHOP & Survive COVID-19
campaigns.description: Welcome!  For those of you who may not be aware, I quit my full-time job after quite a traumatic and emotionally abusive school year. I was completely shattered and disillusioned by the systems in place that often times push out educators such as myself. The educators who hold radical visions for our future and utilize art to reimagine our reality. Although it was a battle lost, I have decided to continue fighting to win the war. I will invest my gifts and my energy in sustaining a business that is accountable, grounded in truth, is constantly shifting towards best practices, and is invested in decolonization and the cyclical force of community.     Call to Action: ¬† Please donate anything you can to support my business¬† LOVE. LIGHT   POETRY (LLP) by  MAR 31TH. Just before National Poetry Month!        2020 Fundraising Goals:     The goal for LOVE. LIGHT   POETRY (LLP) is expansion and abundance. We are working to construct a stronger and sustainable foundation for the growth of LLP.    Become an LLC      LLP will construct a sustainable foundation for LLP by becoming an LLC. February 1, will mark LLP‚Äôs 3rd year in existence fulfilling its mission to expose the world to the medicinal elements of poetry and to fortify the accessibility of poetry workshops that urge individuals to be in constant dialogue with their life's purpose.¬†     Expand the SHOP       We would like to expand the SHOP with new apparel exhibiting lines of poetry that further spread the mission of LLP.¬† Our apparel has successfully blessed individuals that come in reach with the radiating sun logo with love and light throughout the U.S and internationally.      Strides in 2019:         ¬†*¬† The video above is a peak into the Open Mic portion of a workshop *    - In 2019, LOVE. LIGHT   POETRY (LLP) serviced approximately 80 individuals in 9 workshops. LLP has hired two young women of color to intern experiencing first hand the functions of a business and have access to social/emotional development through our poetry workshops.   - Our apparel has successfully expanding beyond the 50 states and have been worn in Ghana, the Dominican Republic, Barbados, and Indonesia.   - Furthermore, we have been blessed to have run LLP with the support of our intimate communities and partnerships with organizations such as the People‚Äôs Forum, May Day Space, The Audre Lorde Project, Children‚Äôs Art Carnival, Survival Arts and more.¬†         Closing Message:     Every morning I arise and see the quote on my wall ‚ÄúEverything seems impossible until it is done,‚Äù by Nelson Mandela.     The only way our dreams come true is through the faith resting within ourselves and that of which is affirmed by the   communities  ¬† we create.  Anything  you can contribute is greatly appreciated! Please SHARE this GoFundMe within your communities to spread the word!¬†   Many blessings to you in the new year. The world is all yours, how you will you fill it with LOVE   LIGHT?     To learn more about LOVE. LIGHT   POETRY,¬† visit our website  here ¬†¬†.

campaigns.title: Help my Dad live amongst the Corona Virus, China
campaigns.description: As many people are well aware, the Corona Virus has spead from China and created a global issue. But in China itself it's an epidemic! My Dad, however, who health is already in extremely poor condition, is right in the middle of it in China. He's 70 years old and is already on oxygen from a pulmonary embolism he had a year ago... at the moment, he's told me that most shops have closed down and the streets are empty due to the virus and most people are choosing to confine themselves to their homes so as to avoid the spread. He and his wife have both lost their jobs and struggling to make ends meet... He's a very proud man, so hearing him admit this much terrifies me. I've tried to offer my own financial support at times also, but he's far too proud to ask for help... But I'm not. Please help. I've never considered making one of these myself, and probably wouldn't if it were only for myself... but it's for my Dad. campaigns.title: Corona Virus Cure
campaigns.description: So far, there is no cure or vaccine for the virus, which has infected more than 80,000 people and killed more than 2,700 worldwide.Hope for treating Coronavirus ¬†could be on the horizon, as the first US study of a drug to treat the illness is underway. So far, there is no cure or vaccine for the virus, which has infected more than 80,000 people and killed more than 2,700 worldwide in the past few months. News of the drug testing came Tuesday, just as a federal health official warned that the virus will eventually start spreading in US communities. A clinical trial to evaluate the safety and effectiveness of the antiviral drug remdesivir in adults diagnosed with coronavirus started at the University of Nebraska Medical Center in Omaha, the National Institutes of Health said. The first participant is an American who was evacuated from the Diamond Princess Crew ship docked in Japan. Also on Tuesday, top officials at the Centers for Disease Control and Prevention warned about the potential spreading of coronavirus in the US.
